byang chub rab la gzhol zhing spyad pa spyod pa dag / yon tan thams cad mthar phyin pa/ /legs pa mi zad de dag spyod 'di'o/ /'jig rten 'das pa smra ba rnams/ /smra ba'i dam
pa smra ba'i seng+ger gyur pa dag /'gro ba dag bya'i mthar phyin pa/ /rnam dag sems ldan de dag spyod 'di'o/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi dbang bskur bas/ /chos kyi dam pa rab la mngon
par dbang bskur zhing / /chos kyi tshul gyi rjes su song ba rnams/ /yid yangs ldan pa de dag spyod 'di'o/ /'gro ba'i srid pa kun srung zhing / /sems can thams cad rnam par bsgoms
pa'i yid ldan pa/ /shin tu rtogs pa'i mdzod 'chang rnams/ /chos kyi ri bo de dag spyod 'di yin/ /dbyangs kyi yan lag gcig gis kyang / /'khor rnams brjod du med pa shes
par byed pa dag /dbyangs kyi tshul la zhugs pa rnams/ /chags med mthong ba de dag spyod 'di'o/ /gang zhig tshig lam rjes song zhing / /ye shes shin tu 'phags pas rnam par
me rtog pa/ /rnam par rtog med spyod yul can/ /rang bzhin med mthong de dag spyod 'di'o/ /chos kyi rgya mtshor gnas 'cha' zhing / /chos rnams thams cad rgya yis rab tu
'debs byed pa/ /mtshan nyid med pa'i tshul ldan rnams/ /dpal gyi tshul can de dag spyod 'di'o/ /bde bar gshegs pa'i zhing gcig tu/ /bsam gyis mi khyab pa yi
dus rnams chud byed cing / /bskal pa grangs med 'dzud byed pa/ /skyo med brtson pa de dag spyod 'di 'o/ /tha dad mtshan can mi yi dbang / /skra yi rtse mo
gcig la sangs rgyas brjod yas pa/ /gang gis de dag mthong gyur rnams/ /spyod pa bzang ldan de dag spyod 'di'o/ /gang gis skra yi cha tsam la/ /brjod du med pa'i 'dren
pa rnams ni mthong gyur cing / /de bzhin chos dbyings thams cad de/ /rgyal sras de dag spyod pa 'di yin no/ /bskal pa brjod du med pa rnams/ /sems bskyed gcig
gis rab tu shes par gyur pa rnams/ /ring dang thung bar nges med pa/ /rnam thar spyod pa de dag spyod 'di'o/ /lta zhing don med mi 'gyur la/ /sangs rgyas spyod pa dag la
don yod las ldan rnams/ /chags pa med pa'i yid can dag /rgyal ba'i dam pa de dag spyod 'di yin/ /gang gis sangs rgyas mthong ba'i tshe/ /bskal pa khrag khrig nam
du'ang ngoms par mi 'gyur bar/ /dga' ba shin tu spyod pa rnams/ /blta na don yod de dag spyod 'di 'o/ /sems can khams ni mtha' yas pa/ /sems shing bskal pa
yang po zad par byed pa rnams/ /sems can med par shes pa dag /sems can gtso bo de dag spyod 'di 'o/ /bsod nams mang po bsags pa rnams/ /ye shes skyob pa
bsod nams chen po'i snying po can/ /bsod nams mu stegs 'gro ba yi/ /sems can dam pa'i spyod 'di 'o/ /chos dbyings kun tu mtha' yas pa/ /nam mkha'i rnam pa bzhin
du de dag tshad med pa/ /tshig gi lam la gnas pa rnams/ /seng+ge'i sgra sgrog de dag spyod 'di 'o/ /gang zhig ting 'dzin gcig pu la/ /ting nge 'dzin ni khrag khrig brjod du med
pa yi| |chos kyi gnas su zhugs gyur pa/ /smra ba'i zla ba de dag spyod 'di 'o/ /bzod pa'i stobs kyi mthar phyin pa/ /de dag chos rnams thams cad zhi la bzod pa yin/ /mi sgul
sems dang ldan pa rnams/ /mtha' yas shes can de dag spyod 'di 'o/ /'jig rten khams ni gcig nas kyang / /de dag lus ni g.yo zhing 'phro bar mi byed par/ /'gro ba kun
tu'ang snang ba rnams/ /mtha' yas lus can de dag spyod 'di yin/ /gang zhig zhing gi tshul rnams kun/ /rjes su 'jug pa shin tu phra bar rab shes kyang / /yongs su rgyas bya'i
blo med pa/ /mtha' yas sems dpa' de dag spyod 'di 'o/ /gnas dang gnas min shes gyur cing / /stobs la 'jug pa dag tu shin tu zhugs pa rnams/ /stobs kyi dam pa
'dzin pa dag /stobs kyi stobs chen de dag spyod 'di 'o/ /'das pa dag dang ma 'ongs dang / /da ltar byung ba'i las rnams shin tu 'byams klas la/ /rtag tu shes pa 'jug gyur
pa| |tshul shes de dag spyod pa 'di yin no/ /'gro ba'i dus dang dus min pa/ /ji ltar sems can 'dul bar 'gyur ba de bzhin shes/ /dus la 'bebs
par mkhas pa rnams/ /shes pa de dag spyod pa 'di yin no/ /chos la spyod pa kun srung zhing / /lus dang ngag dang yid kyi rnams kyang srung byed pa/ /bdud kyi lam du ma
zhugs pa/ /shes pa'i blo can de dag spyod 'di 'o/ /rnam par gzhag pa'i rgyus mkhas pa/ /chos rnams la ni ji ltar spobs par 'jug pa rnams/ /de bzhin nyid dang
yul mnyam pa/ /bder gshegs spyod pa de dag spyod 'di yin/ /chags med mdzod la brtson pa dag /gzungs kyi sgo mo'i dkyil 'khor rab tu shes pa rnams/ /chos kyi
dbyings la 'jug pa yi/ /rjes su zhugs pa de dag spyod 'di yin/ /dus gsum gshegs pa'i rgyal ba rnams/ /ji snyed bzhugs pa kun dang gcig sems yid ldan
pa| |rang bzhin gcig tu rtogs pa rnams/ /chags med rigs can de dag spyod 'di 'o/ /bsgribs med ye shes tshul shes shing / /bsgribs med ye shes phyag rgya dag la
zhugs pa rnams/ /bsgribs med mig kyang bdog byed pa/ /mig can de dag spyod pa 'di yin no/ /gnyis su med la spyod pa yi/ /rdzu 'phrul rnam par gzhog pa'i mgon
po thams cad kun/ /rnam par 'phrul pa mkhyen pa rnams/ /gnyis su med spyod de dag spyod 'di 'o/ /chos kyi sprin ni mtha' yas pa'i/ /char chen rab tu 'bebs shing zhing rnams
yangs par rgyu/ /don rnams thams cad rtogs gyur pa/ /chos sprin de dag spyod yul 'di yin no/ /dad pa phyir ldog mi 'gyur zhing / /rtsa ba shin tu tshugs shing dad pa rnam dag
pa| |rnam thar shes pa thams cad la/ /bslab pa rnams kyi spyod yin mnyan par gyis/ /'gro ba 'di dag ji snyed pa/ /ma lus thams cad sems bskyed gcig tu chud byas te/ /
sems kyi rang bzhin shes pa rnams/ /rang bzhin med pa de dag spyod 'di yin/ /zhing rnams bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ /chos kyi dbyings rnams kun tu gang gis sprul byas shing / /
mnyam pa med par der spyod pa/ /dpe med 'gro ldan de dag spyod 'di 'o/ /sangs rgyas zhing rnams mtha' yas te/ /de dag kun na 'jig rten mgon po gang bzhugs pa/ /de
rnams dang ni mngon sum du/ /sangs rgyas zhabs kyi drung na 'khod gyur pa/ /de dag lus ni gcig pur yang / /ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par gzhag pa rab tu ston/ /lus ni stong
phrag mtha' yas pa/ /ting nge 'dzin las ldang na shin tu snang / /spyod pa zab dang ldan byas nas/ /spros pa med pa'i spyod pa dag la rab spyod pa/ /dga' ba'i yid dang ldan pa
rnams| |sems can kun la dga' bar byed pa yin/ /dbang po tha dad tshul rnams la/ /blo gros gnas shing shes pa rab tu thob pa rnams/ /dbang po
dag ni mi gnas pa/ /ma dul 'dul ba 'di dag spyod 'di yin/ /tha dad chos kyi tshul rnams la/ /chos rnams thams cad kun la dbang bas shes gyur pa/ /kun kyang sangs
rgyas mdzad pa la/ /dmigs pa'i tshogs ni rab tu spyod pa yin/ /shin tu yangs pa'i ljags mnga' ba/ /de dag dbang po rnams dang legs pa'i spyod thos na/ /su yi sems
shig dad mi 'gyur/ /nam mkha' lta bu de dag spyod 'di yin/ /kun tu mtha' yas shes ldan zhing / /chos rnams kun la kun tu mtha' yas mig yod pa/ /ye shes mtha'
yas tshul ldan pa/ /mtha' yas shes can de dag spyod 'di yin/ /zad mi nus pa zad byed cing / /bsod nams 'byams klas yod pas bsod nams mi zad pa/ /'gro ba dag
pa'i mthar phyin rnams/ /'dra med de dag spyod pa 'di yin no/ /tshogs dang ldan zhing 'jig rten dang / /de dag chos kyi lam la rab tu 'jug byas kyang / /de dag sems
can 'du shes med/ /sems can bye ba khrag khrig rab tu 'grel/ /nyon mongs med pa rtogs shes shing / /spyod pa mngon par shes pa thams cad mthong ba rnams/ /bde ba'i
lam rnams ston byed pa/ /mig can de dag tshul ni 'di yin no/ /sangs rgyas ye shes spyod pa dang / /tshad med yon tan dam pa thob par gyur pa rnams/ /mi 'jigs pa ni rnyed gyur
pa| |shes can de dag tshul ni 'di yin no/ /'jug pa kun la rab zhugs shing / /zhing la 'jug dang chos kyi dbang la zhugs gyur pa/ /sems can zhugs la gnas byas nas/ /
sems can dam pa sems can 'grol bar byed/ /phyogs rnams kun tu chos kyi rnga/ /brdungs shing 'jig rten 'di dag ston byed pa'i/ /chos rab sbyin pa'i bdag po rnams/ /nyams
med rtogs byed de dag spyod 'di yin/ /skyil mo krung 'dug gcig gis kyang / /zhing yangs brjod du med pa kun tu rgyas byed kyang / /su yi lus la gnod med pa/ /chos sku ldan
pa de dag spyod 'di yin/ /don dang yi ge gcig la yang / /shin tu bstan pa bye ba khrag khrig rjes su 'breng / /de dag mtha' ni rnyed mi nus/ /mnyam med shes ldan de dag spyod
'di yin/ /bsgribs pa med pa'i tshul shes pa/ /sangs rgyas rnam thar tshul la shin tu bslab pa rnams/ /'jigs pa med par gyur pa dag /tshad med de dag tshul ni 'di yin no/ /
de dag phyogs rnams rgya mtsho dang / /zhing rnams rgya mtsho mtha' ma dag dang dbus med par/ /shes pa rgya mtsho ldan pa yi/ /chos rnams rgya mtshos 'jig rten tshim par byed/ /gang
rnams gshegs shing skye 'gyur dang / /byang chub rnam par 'tshang rgya 'gro ba kun dag tu/ /chu zhig mngon par snang gyur pa/ /mtha' dbus med pa de dag
spyod 'di yin/ /mya ngan 'da' ba du ma yang / /zhing rnams bye ba khrag khrig dag na mngon par snang / /'on kyang smra ba'i seng+ge rnams/ /mya ngan mi 'da' smon lam phyir mi ldog
chos rnams lhun ni gcig gyur cing / /sems can kun dang lus kyang gcig tu gyur pa rnams/ /rgyal ba dag la rtog med pas/ /lus gcig gyur pa spyod 'di yin/ /
tshig dang don rnams tha dad pa/ /'jig rten khams rnams mtha' dang dbus yod ma yin par/ /rang bzhin gcig la mos pa dag/ dus gsum shes pa de dag spyod 'di
yin| |sems can dag dang rgyal ba dang / /chos kyi tshul rnams kun la zad pa med rnyed pa/ /sangs rgyas byin la mos pa dag /rgyal bas byin brlabs de dag spyod 'di
yin| |chags pa med pa'i sku 'dra zhing / /chags pa med pa'i mig gi pha rol phyin pa rnams/ /chags med rna ba mkhas pa dag /chags med yid can de dag spyod 'di
yin| |mngon shes thams cad rnyed pa dang / /ye shes mngon par shes pa'i rjes su song ba rnams/ /shes pa kun gyi dpal ldan pa/ /shes pa bzang can de dag spyod
'di yin/ /shin tu mnyam gzhag sems ldan zhing / /ye shes mtha' yas shas rab shin tu che ba rnams/ /kun tu spyod yul ldan pa dag /thams cad gzigs pa de dag spyod
'di yin/ /yon tan kun gyi mthar phyin pa/ /sems can yangs pa gcig nas gcig brgyud sgrol ba rnams/ /yid ni yongs su nyams med pa/ /rtag tu brtson pa de dag spyod
'di yin/ /kun mkhyen thams cad gzigs pa dag /sangs rgyas thams cad dus gsum gshegs pa mgon po yi/ /rigs dang rgyud du skyes pa rnams/ /rgyal sras de dag
spyod pa 'di yin no/ /rjes su bstan la brtson byed pa/ /phas kyi rgol ba'i lam la 'jigs med spyod pa dag /mtha' yas blo yi spyod pa dang / /sangs rgyas byang chub rjes su zhugs
pa rnams/ /mtha' dbus med pa'i zhing gi rnams/ /thams cad kun du snang ba gcig gis gsal bar byed/ /thams cad snang bar byed pa rnams/ /mun pa sel ba'i spyod
pa 'di yin no/ /gang du rgyal bas mdzad 'os pa/ /der ni sems can khrag khrig shin tu 'dus byed cing / /sangs rgyas sku dang sangs rgyas zhing / /sangs rgyas rgyan can khrag
khrig snang bar byed/ /spyod pa dag ni mtha' yas la/ /su gnas brtan pa de dag shes par ji ltar rung / /spyod pa thams cad shin tu ston/ /'gro bar spyod pa thams cad mthar
thug byed/ /chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam pa yin/ /bdag gi lus ni brjod du med par gyur pa yis/ /de dag legs pa brjod byas kyang / /bskal pa
khrag khrig dag gis mi zad do/ /yon tan kun tu mtha' yas shing / /yon tan mchog rnams thams cad mtha' yas pa'i/ /yon tan kun ni brjod yas te/ /thub pas
bskal par gsungs kyang zad mi 'gyur/ /rang rgyal rnams dang nyan thos la/ /gzhol par gyur pa'i 'jig rten gzhan gyi rnams kyis lta/ /bskal pa brjod yas brjod byas
kyang / /zad par mi nus de ni smon ci dgos/ /shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba las/ yon tan me tog shin tu bsags pa zhes bya ba
byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa bstan pa'i le'u ste/ nyi shu drug pa'o// //de nas byang chub sems dpa' yon tan dang ldan pas yang byang chub sems dpa' de
dag la smras pa/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /bcu po 'di dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gter yin te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang /
da ltar byung ba rnams kyis gsungs so/ /gsung ngo / /gsung bar 'gyur ro/ /bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dad pa'i gter dang / tshul khrims kyi gter dang / ngo tsha shes pa'i
gter dang / khrel yod pa'i gter dang / thos pa'i gter dang / gtong ba'i gter dang / dam 'cha' ba'i gter dang / rtogs pa'i gter dang / blo gros kyi gter dang / blo'i gter
te| kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i gter bcu po de dag ni/ 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom
ldan 'das rnams kyis gsungs so/ /gsung ngo / /gsung bar 'gyur ro/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /de la dad pa'i gter gang zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /'di la byang chub
sems dpa' chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar dad par byed do/ /chos thams cad mtshan ma med pa zhes bya bar dad par byed do/ /chos thams cad smon pa med pa zhes bya
bar dad par byed do/ /chos thams cad ma byas pa zhes bya bar dad par byed do/ /chos thams cad ma brtags pa zhes bya bar dad par byed do/ /chos thams cad gnas med pa
zhes bya bar dad par byed do/ /chos thams cad tshad med pa zhes bya bar dad par byed do/ /chos thams cad bla na med pa zhes bya bar dad par byed do/ /chos thams cad 'dar
mi rung ba zhes bya bar dad par byed do/ /chos thams cad 'byung ba med pa zhes bya bar dad par byed do/ /de ni/ chos dang mthun pa'i dad pa dang ldan pa yin te/ chos thams
cad bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /zhes bya bas zhum par mi 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas thams cad bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /zhes bya bas zhum par mi 'gyur
ro| |sems can gyi khams thams cad bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /zhes bya bas zhum par mi 'gyur ro/ /chos kyi dbyings bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /zhes bya bas zhum par mi
'gyur ro/ /nam mkha'i dbyings bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /zhes bya bas zham par mi 'gyur ro/ /mya ngan las 'da' ba'i dbyings bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /zhes bya bas zhum par
mi 'gyur ro/ /'das pa'i dus bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /zhes bya bas zhum par mi 'gyur ro/ /ma 'ongs pa'i dus bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /zhes bya bas zhum par mi 'gyur
ro| |de ltar byung ba'i dus bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /zhes bya bas zhum par mi 'gyur ro/ /bskal ba thams cad la 'jug pa bsam gyis mi khyab po/ /zhes bya bas zhum par
mi 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i dad pa ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis ji ltar mkhyen pa bzhin du gcig tu nges par gyur ba yin te/ sangs rgyas kyi ye
shes kyi mtha' yang zad mi shes so/ /'jig rten gyi khams rnams kyang zad mi shes te/ 'jig rten gyi khams re rer yang mtha' yas pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs ba'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas so/ /mngon par 'tshang rgya'o/ /mngon par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /yang dag par byung ngo / /yang dag
par 'byung ngo / /yang dag par 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /yongs su mya ngan 'das so/ /yongs su mya ngan las 'da'o/ /yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur te/ sangs rgyas kyi ye
shes de ni/ 'bri ba'am/ 'phel ba'am/ skye ba'am/ 'gag pa'am/ 'pho ba'am/ 'gro ba'am/ nye bar byed pa'am/ ring bar byed pa'am/ shes par byed pa'am/ 'byin
par byed pa ma yin te/ de ni/ sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la yang dag par gnas pas/ zad pa med cing mtha' yas pa'i dad pa'i gter dang ldan pa yin no/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/
dad pa 'di ni/ mtha' yas pa/ kun tu mtha' yas pa/ mi zad pa/ phyir mi ldog pa/ myu gur gyur ba ma yin pa/ tha dad pa ma yin pa/ ma 'dres pa/ rtsa ba brtan pa/ 'phags pa
dang mthun pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa rigs kyi rgyud du gyur pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rigs yang dag par 'dzin pa/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi mos pa yang dag par
skyed pa| de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i rjes su song ba/ nges par rtogs pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rigs la mkhas par gyur pa yin te/ kye rgyal ba'i
sras dag/ 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi dad pa'i gter te/ de la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni/ sangs
rgyas kyi chos thams cad thos par gyur na/ bden par khong du chud de/ sems can thams cad la rnam par dbye ba'i phyir nan tan du byed par 'gyur ro/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de la
byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul khrims kyi gter gang zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /'di la byang chub sems dpa' thog mar phun sum tshogs pa'i tshul khrims dang ldan
pa yin| byin gyis ma brlabs pa'i tshul khrims dang ldan pa yin/ mi gnas pa'i tshul khrims dang ldan pa yin/ lhag par lta ba med pa'i tshul khrims dang ldan pa yin/
'gal ba med pa'i tshul khrims dang ldan pa yin/ gzhan la mi gnod pa'i tshul khrims dang ldan pa yin/ ma 'dres pa'i tshul khrims dang ldan pa yin/ nye ba'i nyon mongs
pa med pa'i tshul khrims dang ldan pa yin/ skyon med pa'i tshul khrims dang ldan pa yin/ kha na ma tho ba med pa'i tshul khrims dang ldan pa yin/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /ji
ltar na| byang chub sems dpa' thog mar phun sum tshogs pa'i tshul khrims dang ldan pa yin zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /'di la byang chub sems dpa' thog ma nyid
du sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde bar sems pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' byin gyis ma brlabs pa'i tshul khrims dang ldan pa
yin zhe na/ mu stegs can gyi gnas dang mi 'dra ba'i tshul khrims yin te/ de ni/ 'di ltar rang bzhin gyis dus gsum mnyam pa nyid du go cha bgos shing spyod pa'o/ /ji ltar
na| byang chub sems dpa' mi gnas pa'i tshul khrims dang ldan pa yin zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /'di la 'dod pa'i khams la mi gnas pa'i tshul khrims can yin/ gzugs
kyi khams la mi gnas pa'i tshul khrims can yin/ gzugs med pa'i khams la mi gnas pa'i tshul khrims can yin/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'khor de dag la bag gir bya ba
med de| de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' mi gnas pa'i tshul khrims dang ldan pa yin no/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' lhag par lta ba med
ba'i tshul khrims dang ldan pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'gyod pa med pa'i rgyu dang ldan pa yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni/ 'di ltar mtshams med pa'i las
mngon par 'du mi byed de/ tshul khrims lhod pa la gzhol ba ma yin no/ /de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' lhag par lta ba med pa'i tshul khrims dang ldan pa yin no/ /ji ltar
na| byang chub sems dpa' 'gal ba med pa'i tshul khrims dang ldan pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' ma bcas pa ni/ 'cha' bar mi byed/ bcas
ba ni| gcod par mi byed de/ de ni/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i mthar thug tu ji ltar mthun pa'i chos dang ldan pa yin no/ /gang gis pha rol gyi sdug bsngal gyi rgyur 'gyur ba
dang | pha rol 'khrug par 'gyur ba'i tshul khrims de lta bu dam bca' ba la dam bcas shing mi gnas te/ de ni/ 'di ltar pha rol gyi sems dad par bya ba'i phyir tshul
khrims yang dag par len par byed do/ /ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' gzhan la mi gnod pa'i tshul khrims dang ldan pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa'
sems can thams cad gtse ba'i phyir tshul khrims kyi rig sngags dang / gsang sngags dang / sman gyi sbyor ba de lta bu mi sgrub kyi/ de ni/ sems can thams cad bskyab
pa'i phyir tshul khrims yang dag par blangs te gnas so/ /ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' ma 'dres pa'i tshul khrims dang ldan pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems
dpa' chad par lta ba dang / rtag par lta ba dang 'dres pa'i tshul khrims yang dag par len par mi byed de/ de ni/ 'di ltar rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la brten pa'i
tshul khrims yang dag par len to/ /ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' nye ba'i nyon mongs pa med pa'i tshul khrims dang ldan pa yin zhe na/ yon tan med pa bstan par bya ba'i phyir
gzhan gyi sems la lta zhing rtog pa rnam pa sna tshogs su 'gyur ba ma yin no/ /de ni/ 'di ltar chos kyis ngoms pa dang ldan pa yin te/ 'byung ba'i lam tshol zhing sbyor ba'i tshul
khrims yang dag par blangs te gnas so/ /ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' skyon med pa'i tshul khrims dang ldan pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims des
log pa'i tshul khrims nye bar bzung ste gang gis pha rol po dma' ba'i tshul can du 'gyur bar bdag la mi bstod/ gzhan la mi smod do/ /de ni/ 'di ltar g.yeng ba med pa nye bar
bzung ste tshul khrims yang dag par blangs shing gnas so/ /ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' kha na ma tho ba med pa'i tshul khrims dang ldan pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems
dpa' srog gcod pa yongs su spangs pa yin te/ ma byin par len pa dang / 'dod pas log par g.yem pa dang / brdzun du smra ba dang / phra ma'i tshig dang / ngag brlang ba dang / tshig
kyal ba dang / chags sems dang / gnod sems dang / log par lta ba yongs su spangs pa yin te/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yang dag par blangs te gnas so/ /de ltar na/ byang chub
sems dpa' kha na ma tho ba med pa'i tshul khrims dang ldan pa yin/ de 'di snyam du sems skyed de/ gang ji snyam du sems can rnams tshul khrims ngan pa
can la yi dam 'cha' zhing / spyod pa thams cad ni/ phyin ci log gi rgyu las byung ba ste/ de ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis thugs su chud de phyin ci log tu
gyur pa'i sems can rnams ni/ tshul khrims log pa la spyod kyi/ bdag gis ni/ ci nas kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas te/ de
bzhin nyid kyi don du chos bstan par 'gyur ba de ltar bya'o/ /snyam mo/ /kye rgyal pa'i sras dag/ 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul khrims kyi gter te/ gnyis
pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ngo tsha shes pa'i gter gang zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mtha'i
spyod pa nye bar bzung ste/ gang 'di tshe rabs kyi 'khor ba thog pa ma dang tha ma med pa rgyas par ma dang 'grogs pa dang / pha dang 'grogs pa dang / zhang po dang 'grogs pa dang / srid
mo dang 'grogs pa dang / spun dang 'grogs pa dang / bu dang 'grogs pa dang / bu mo dang 'grogs par gyur kyang gcig la gcig 'tshe ba dang / gcig la gcig kyal ka byed
pa dang / gcig la gcig gnod pa byed pa dang / gcig la gcig 'khrig pa dang / gcig la gcig bsngo ba dang / gcig la gcig 'jig pa dang / gcig la gcig 'bod pa dang /
gcig la gcig za ba dang / gcig la gcig dbang ba dang / gcig la gcig 'khol bar gyur pa de yang 'dod chags kyi dbang dang / zhe sdang gi dbang dang / gti mug gi dbang
dang / rgyags pa'i dbang dang / nga rgyal gyi dbang dang / 'chab pa'i dbang dang / gnya' drag gi dbang dang / phrag dog gi dbang dang / 'jungs pa'i dbang dang / g.yo'i dbang dang / sgyu'i
dbang dang / mi dga' ba'i las 'di rnams shin tu blangs pa'i phyir sems can dag gcig la gcig 'di lta bu'i rnam pa ngan pa dag nyams su myong bar gyur te/ thams cad kyang mi
shes pa'i dbang gis gyur pa nas g.yo dang sgyu'i bar gyi dbang gis gyur te/ gcig la gcig bag mi byed/ rim gro mi byed/ gcig la gcig bkur sti mi byed/ gcig la gcig
phud dud mi byed/ gcig la gcig btsam pa med pa dang / gcig la gcig mi mkhas pa dang / gcig la gcig gnod pa dang / gcig la gcig gsod pa dang / gcig la
gcig dgrar byed par gyur to/ /zhes ngo tsha skyed do/ /ji ltar 'das pa'i dus na bdag dang / sems can rnams kyi rnam par ngan pa 'di lta bu'i tshul byung ba de bzhin da ltar
byung ba'i dus na yang bdag dang / sems can thams cad la rnam pa ngan ba de lta bu dag yod do/ /ji ltar da ltar byung ba'i dus na bdag dang / sems can
rnams la rnam par ngan pa de lta bu dag yod pa de bzhin ma 'ongs pa'i dus na yang bdag dang / sems can thams cad la rnam pa ngan pa de lta bu dag 'byang bar 'gyur te/ de ni/
'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis kyang thugs su chud do/ /de ltar bdag gis ngo tsha med cing mi bzod la/ sangs
rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'das ba dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba rnams kyis thugs su chud bzhin du rnam pa ngan pa 'di lta bu la gnas pa ni/ mi rigs mi cha'i/ /da ni/
bdag gis ci nas kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas nas de bzhin nyid kyi don du sems can rnams la chos bstan par 'gyur ba
de ltar bya'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ngo tsha shes pa'i gter te/ gsum pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de la byang chub sems
dpa' rnams kyi khrel yod pa'i gter gang zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' ni/ mtha' med par tshol bas khrel bar 'dzin pa yin te/ gzugs
btsal ba dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya btsal ba dang / bu dang bu mo'i don du btsal ba dang / nor dang / bran pho dang / bran mo dang / g.yog yid du 'ong ba btsal pa'i phyir
bdag gis kyang mi tshul mi cha ba'i gcam bu bya bar 'gyur ro/ /zhes te/ de ni/ tshol ba'i dbang du chags pa nye bar mi len to/ /zhes sdang nye bar mi len to/ /gti mug nye bar mi len
to| |de bzhin du nga rgyal dang / 'chab pa dang / phrag dog dang / 'jungs pa dang / g.yo dang / sgyu dang / gnod par bya ba nye bar mi len to/ /de ni/ 'di ltar dran pa skye ste/ gang ci
yang rung ste/ sems can rnams rnam pa ngan pa de lta bu nye bar 'dzin pa thams cad ni/ ma rig pa'i dbang nas g.yo dang / sgyu dang / gnod par byed pa'i dbang gi bar gyis byung ba
ste| de dag gcig la gcig bag mi byed/ rim gro mi byed/ bsti stang du mi byed/ phu dud du mi byed cing / btsam pa med de/ grogs por mi shes shing gcig la gcig nyam nga
ba dang / gcig la gcig gsod pa dang / gcig la gcig dgrar len pa 'di lta bu'i rnam pa ngan pa dag nye bar len to/ /mngon par dga'o/ /mngon par zhe na to/ /tshol lo//
kun tu tshol lo/ /kun tu btsal nas mngon par smon to/ /'jal lo/ /kun tu 'jal lo/ /de ltar yang mig nyams pa de dag lam gang dang gang nas mngal gyi dri mas gos
te byung ba de nyid du 'khrig pa'i chos la brten te mi gtsang ba byung ba ni/ kun gyis kyang shes so/ /de bas na/ de ltar bdag bla na med pa yang dag
par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smon pa khrel med pa'i dbang du gyur nas 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sku slu bar byed
pa 'di ni/ mi rigs kyi/ da ni/ bdag gis ci nas kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas nas de bzhin nyid kyi don du chos bstan par
'gyur ba de ltar bya'o/ /snyam mo/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi khrel yod pa'i gter te/ bzhi pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /de la byang
chub sems dpa' rnams kyi thos pa'i gter gang zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /'di la byang chub sems dpa' thos pa dang ldan pa yin te/ 'di yod na 'di 'byung ngo / /
'di med na 'di mi 'byung ngo / /'di byung bas 'di skye'o/ /'di 'gag pas 'di 'gag go /'di dag ni/ 'jig rten pa'i chos so/ /'di dag ni/ 'jig rten las 'das
pa'i chos so/ /'di dag ni/ 'dus byas kyi chos so/ /'di dag ni/ 'dus ma byas kyi chos so/ /'di dag ni/ lung bstan pa'i chos so/ /'di dag ni/ lung ma bstan pa'i
chos so| |de la ci yod pas gang 'byung bar 'gyur zhe na/ ma rig pa yod pas 'du byed rnams 'byung ngo / /ci med pas gang med par 'gyur zhe na/ rnam par shes pa med pas ming
dang gzugs med par 'gyur ro/ /ci skyes pas gang skye bar 'gyur zhe na/ sred pa skyes pas sdug bsngal skye'o/ /ci 'gags pas gang 'gag par 'gyur zhe na/ srid pa 'gags
pas skye ba 'gag go/ de la 'jig rten pa'i chos rnams gang zhe na/ gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'o/ /de la 'jig rten las
'das pa'i chos rnams gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ tshul khrims kyi phung po dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang / shes rab kyi phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang / rnam par
grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po ste/ 'di dag ni/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos so/ /'dus byas kyi chos rnams gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs
kyi khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams dang / sems can gyi khams te/ 'di dag ni/ 'dus byas kyi chos so/ /'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams gang zhe na/ nam mkha' dang / mya
ngan las 'das pa dang / so sor brtags te 'gog pa dang / so sor ma brtags par 'gog pa dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang / chos kyi gnas nyid de/ 'di dag ni /
'dus ma byas pa'i chos so/ /lung bstan pa'i chos rnams gang zhe na/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / dge sbyong gi 'bras bu bzhi dang / tha dad pa yang dag
par shes pa bzhi dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs
lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad de/ 'di dag ni/ lung bstan pa'i chos so/ /lung ma bstan pa'i chos rnams gang zhe na/
'jig rten mtha' yod pa dang / 'jig rten mtha' med pa dang / mtha' yod pa'ang ma yin/ mtha' med pa'ang ma yin pa zhes bya ba 'di ni/ lung du ma bstan pa'o/ /'jig
rten rtag pa dang / 'jig rten mi rtag pa dang / rtag pa'ang yin la/ mi rtag pa'ang yin pa dang / rtag pa'ang ma yin la/ mi rtag pa'ang ma yin pa zhes bya ba 'di ni/ lung ma
bstan pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa shi phan chad yod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa shi phan chad med pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa shi phan chad yod kyang yod la/ med
kyang med pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa shi phan chad yod pa'ang ma yin/ med pa'ang ma yin pa zhes bya ba ni/ lung ma bstan pa'o/ /bdag dang sems can rnams yod
pa dang / bdag dang sems can rnams med pa dang / bdag dang sems can rnams yod pa'ang yin la/ med pa'ang yin pa dang / bdag dang sems can rnams yod pa'ang ma
yin| med pa'ang ma yin pa zhes bya ba 'di ni/ lung ma bstan pa'o/ /sangs rgyas ji snyed cig yongs su mya ngan las 'das/ rang sangs rgyas ji snyed cig yongs su mya ngan las 'das
nyan thos ji snyed cig yongs su mya ngan las 'das/ sangs rgyas ji snyed cig ma byon/ rang sangs rgyas ji snyed cig ma byon/ nyan thos ji snyed cig ma byon/ byang chub sems dpa'
ji snyed cig skye bar 'gyur/ sangs rgyas ji snyed cig bzhugs/ rang sangs rgyas ji snyed cig bzhugs/ nyan thos ji snyed cig bzhugs/ byang chub sems dpa' ji snyed cig
bzhugs/ sangs rgyas dag pas su snga/ rang sangs rgyas dag pas su snga/ nyan thos dag pas su snga/ byang chub sems dpa' dag pas su snga/ sangs rgyas dag pas su 'phyi/ rang
sangs rgyas dag pas su 'phyi/ nyan thos dag pas su 'phyi/ sems can dag pas su 'phyi/ chos dag pas su snga/ 'jig rten gang nas 'ongs/ 'jig rten gang du 'gro /'jig
rten gyi khams ji snyed cig chags par 'gyur/ 'jig rten gyi khams ji snyed cig gnas pa yin/ 'jig rten gyi khams gang nas 'ongs/ 'jig rten gyi khams gang zhig
yongs su zad par 'gyur/ 'khor ba'i sngon gyi mtha' ni/ gang / 'khor ba'i phyi ma'i mtha' ni/ gang zhes bya ba 'di ni/ lung du ma bstan pa'o/ /de 'di ltar
dran pa skye ste/ sems can gang su'ang rung ste/ kun tu rgyug pa dang / kun tu 'khor ba thams cad ni/ chos 'di dag mi shes pa'i phyir te/ de ltar thos pa dang mi ldan pa'i so so'i
skye bo rnams kun tu rgyug go /kun tu 'khor ro/ /de bas na/ de ni/ bdag gis ci nas kyang bsam pa thams cad thos pa'i mdzod bzung ste bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas nas de bzhin nyid kyi don du chos bstan par bya'o/ /zhes bya ba 'di ni/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi
thos pa'i gter te/ lnga pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gtong ba'i gter gang zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /'di la byang chub sems
dpa' gtong ba dang ldan pa yin/ yongs su gtong ba dang ldan pa yin/ nang gi gtong ba dang ldan pa yin/ phyi rol gyi gtong ba dang ldan pa yin/ phyi nang gi gtong ba dang
ldan pa yin/ thams cad gtong ba dang ldan pa yin/ 'das pa gtong ba dang ldan pa yin/ ma 'ongs pa gtong ba dang ldan pa yin/ da ltar byung ba gtong ba dang ldan pa yin/
shin tu gtong pa dang ldan pa yin te/ kye rgyal pa'i sras dag /ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' gtong ba dang ldan pa yin zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ 'di la byang chub
sems dpa' rang bzhin gyis bgo bsha' byed pa'i ngang tshul can yin te/ de rtag tu bgo bsha' byas shing bdag kyang shes kyis spyod pa yin te/ bdag bde bar bya ba dang /
bdag yongs su sbyang ba dang / bdag rim gro bya ba'i phyir yo byad ji snyed du bsags pa de dag thams cad kyang bgo bsha' byas shing spyod kyi/ ma bgos par ni/ ma yin no/ /de
dag spyod pa'i tshe'ang sems 'di snyam du skyed de/ lus 'di la srin bu'i rigs rnam pa sna tshogs brgyad cu gnas te/ de dag kyang bdag gi lus 'di bde bas ni/ bde bar 'gyur
bdag gi lus 'di sdug bsngal bas ni/ sdug bsngal bar 'gyur ro/ /zhes de gang ci la spyod pa de dag thams cad kyang myong ba med pa'i sems kyis de dag mi 'chi ba dang /
de dag bde bar bya ba'i phyir gtong ngo / /gzhan yang de 'di snyam du sems te/ yun ring po nas zas dang lus bde ba la chags par gyur gyi/ da ni/ bdag gi lus la chags
pa las rnam par 'da' bar bya'o/ /zhes bya ba 'di ni/ gtong ba'o/ /byang chub sems dpa'i yongs su gtong ba gang zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' la zas sam/ skom
mam| bza' ba'am/ bca' ba'am/ bldag pa'am/ btung ba'am/ gzhib pa'am/ myang ba'am/ gos sam/ phreng ba'am/ byug pa'am/ rgyan nam/
ci'ang rung ste/ gang spyad na ni/ 'tsho'i/ ma spyad na ni/ 'chi bar 'gyur ba zhig nye bar gnas par gyur la/ de'i tshe slong ba zhig 'ongs te/ de la ci nas kyang zad par 'gyur ba
dang | lhag ma med par bslangs kyang de la byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/ sngon gyi mtha' de dag tu bdag bkres pas shi bar gyur pa yang dmigs pas mi
sleb ste/ su la yang phan par ma gyur to/ /da 'di ltar rim pas sngon chad myong ba'i chos can dang mnyam pa nyid kyis dus byas par gyur la/ sems can de dag kyang bde
bar gyur na/ bdag gis thob par bya ba legs par thob bo/ /bdag gi 'di dag kyang zad kyang rung / 'chi ba'i mthar yang thug kyang rung ste/ sems can rnams 'tsho bar
bya'o| |zhes gtong ba 'di ni/ yongs su gtong ba'o/ /byang chub sems dpa'i nang gi gtong ba gang zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' dar zhing bzang por gnas pa/
gzugs mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa/ mdog rgyas pa gya nom pa dang ldan pa/ khrus dang byug pa legs par byas pa/ phreng ba dang rgyan legs par btags pa/ gos
gsar pa ma bab pa bgos pa/ gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams su rgyal por dbang bskur bas dbang bskur pa/ rin po che bdun dang ldan pa de lta bu'i drung du slong ba dag cig
'ongs te 'di skad du/ bdag cag ni/ na bas gzir to/ /rgas so/ /'khogs so/ /sdug bsngal gyis mnar to/ /nad tshabs che'o/ /nad g.yog med do/ /'chi la thug go /gal
te khyod kyi lus las lag pa'am/ rkang pa'am/ sha'am/ khrag gam/ mgo'am/ klad pa'am/ rus pa'am/ rkang ngam/ su la ci dgos pa de dag khyer cig ces rgyal po la thag thogs
med par rang gi lus bdag cag la byin na/ lus 'dis bdag cag nad 'di las ldang bar 'gyur ro/ /zhes zer na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'di
snyam du sems te/ lus 'di lta zhig chos kyi de 'dra bar 'gyur yang su la yang phan par ma gyur gyi/ da ni/ de lta bu'i chos can gyi lus 'dis sems can 'di dag bde bar 'gyur
bar bya'o/ /zhes nas de la sems bskyed pa 'ga' tsam yang 'gyod par 'gyur ba med pa 'di ni/ nang gi gtong ba zhes bya'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa'i phyi rol gyi gtong
pa gang zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' gzhung de bzhin du rgya cher dbang bskur ba dang / 'khor los bsgyur ba'i srid la gnas pa/ gling bzhi la dbang ba/ rin po che
bdun dang bde ba'i yo byad thams cad dang ldan pa/ thog ma mngon par dbang bskur ba de lta bu'i drung du slong ba dag cig lhags te 'di skad du/ bdag ni/
bkren no/ /dbul lo/ /shin tu sdug bsngal lo/ /nor dang mi ldan no/ /khyod ni/ bde ba'i yo byad thams cad dang ldan na/ byams bu gling bzhi'i 'khor los bsgyur ba'i
srid bdag cag la byin te/ phyis 'di la dbang mi bsgyur bar byas na/ des ni/ bdag cag bde bar 'gyur ro/ /zhes zer na/ de la byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems
te| phun sum tshogs pa thams cad ni/ zad pa'i mthar 'gyur te/ de'i tshe ni/ su'i bsam pa yang yongs su mgu bar bya bar mi nus kyi/ bdag gis da ni/ 'phral du
sems can 'di dag gi bsam pa yongs su tshim par bya'o zhes nas de'i rgyus sems bskyed pa 'ga' tsam 'gyod par 'gyur ba med par gtong ba 'di ni/ phyi rol gyi gtong
ba zhes bya'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa'i phyi nang gi gtong ba gang zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'khor los bsgyur ba'i srid la de ltar dbang bskur ba/ bde ba'i
yo byad thams cad dang ldan pa/ bsag par bya ba rnam par bsags pa de lta bu'i drung du slong ba dag cig 'ongs nas 'di skad du/ khyod kyis ni/ 'khor los bsgyur
ba'i rgyal po sngon chad kyang myong / bdag cag ni/ dge ba ma myong ba yin na/ byams bu 'khor los bsgyur ba'i srid bdag cag la byin la/ khyod kyis bdag cag rim gror bya ba dang /
bsnyen bkur bar gyis shig ces zer na/ de la byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gi lus kyi chos nyid dang / srid kyi chos nyid de dag thams cad kyang tha mar med
par 'gyur ba ste/ lus kyang rjes su 'brang bar gnas la/ srid kyang che zhing slong ba rnams kyang mngon du gyur pa 'di'i tshe snying po med pa las snying po blang bar bya'o/ /zhes nas de'i
rgyus sems bskyed pa 'ga' tsam yang 'gyod par 'gyur ba med par rim gro byed cing gtong ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i phyi nang gi gtong ba zhes bya'o/ /de la byang chub
sems dpa'i thams cad gtong ba gang zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal srid la de ltar dbang bskur zhing / bde ba thams cad dang ldan pa de lta
bu'i drung du slong ba dag cig lhags te 'di skad du/ bdag cag ni/ khyod kyi legs pa dang yon tan snyan pa thos nas grong dang / grong khyer dang / ljongs dang / khams dang /
rgyal po'i gnas du ma nas khyod ni/ gdon mi za bar bdag cag gi bsam pa yongs su tshim par byed par 'gyur snyam ste/ 'dir phyin na/ byams bu khyod kyis bdag cag gi
bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par gyis shig ces nas la la ni/ bdag cag la rin po che bdun dgos so/ /zhes zer/ la la ni/ bdag cag la gling bzhi dgos so/ /zhes zer
la la ni/ bdag cag la rgyal po'i bu dgos so/ /zhes zer/ la la ni/ bdag cag la rgyal po'i mig gnyis dgos so/ /zhes zer/ la la ni/ bdag cag la rgyal po'i lag pa gnyis dgos so/ /zhes zer/ la
la ni| bdag cag la rgyal po'i rkang pa gnyis dgos so/ /zhes zer/ la la ni/ bdag cag la rgyal po'i sha dgos so/ /zhes zer/ la la ni/ bdag cag la rgyal po'i khrag
dgos so/ /zhes zer/ la la ni/ bdag cag la rgyal po'i mgo dgos so/ /zhes zer/ la la ni/ bdag cag la rgyal po'i snying dgos so/ /zhes zer na/ de la byang chub
sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/ sdug pa dang / yid du 'ong ba thams cad dang bral zhing bye bar yang gyur te/ sems can gang gi bsam pa yang yongs su tshim par ma
gyur gyi/ da ni/ bdag gi lus 'bral bar 'gyur ba'i chos can 'dis sems can de dag gi chags sems rtse gzhil bar bya ba'i phyir bsam pa yongs su tshim par bya'o/ /
bcol ba dang ldan pa'i chos kyi gnas su ni/ sems bskyed par mi bya'o/ /zhes nas de dag thams cad gtong yang de'i phyir de la sems bskyed pa gcig tsam yang 'gyod par
'gyur ba med de/ sems can gang la yang rim gro med par mi byed pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i thams cad gtong ba'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa'i 'das pa gtong ba gang zhe na/
'di la byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'das pa rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thos pa dang / 'das pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi phun
sum tshogs pa thams cad nyan cing thos nas de dag thams cad la chags par mi byed/ 'bral bar mi byed/ dmigs su med pas rab tu 'jug ste/ rtog par mi byed/ rnam par
rtog par mi byed/ yongs su rtog par mi byed/ smon par mi byed/ chags par mi byed/ zhen par mi byed/ rten pa'i sems kyis gnas par mi byed de/ rmi lam gyi chos de lta bu
thob par byed kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag la snying po'i 'du shes mi skyed do/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag la rten pa'i 'du shes su mi byed de/ 'on kyang rten pa'i sems can rnams gzung
ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos kyang yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir brjod do/ /'chad do/ /ston to/ /'das pa'i chos nyid la brtags na/ shar phyogs su mi mthong ngo / /lho phyogs
dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs su rjes su mi mthong ngo / /byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams dang / shar lho'i phyogs mtshams dang / lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams dang / nub byang
gi phyogs mtshams dang / 'og dang steng gi phyogs su rjes su mi mthong ste/ de 'di snyam du/ gang ci yang rung ma btang ba de ni/ btang ba'o/ /snyam du sems te/
kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'das pa gtong ba'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa'i ma 'ongs pa gtong ba gang zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa'
sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ma byon pa rnams kyi spyod pa nyan na/ mtshan ma'i tshul dang dngos por 'dzin pas mi 'dzin te/ 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan la brtson par mi byed
pa yin| tshol ba mi mnga' ba yin/ 'dod chags pa'i sems kyis mi smon pa yin/ de la sems mi sdud pa yin te/ myong bar mi byed do/ /smon par mi byed do/ /de dag tu dge
ba'i rtsa ba rnams mi gtong ngo / /de dag tu dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams 'jug par mi byed de/ spyod pa'ang rgyun gcod par mi byed do/ /'on kyang dmigs pa des sangs rgyas kyi
chos su 'grub par bya ba'i phyir te/ sems can rnams kyi bsam pa dang / tshogs sdud par byed cing chos nyid kyang rab tu sdud do/ /chos de ni/ yul na'ang mi gnas/
phyogs na yang mi gnas/ nang na yang ma yin/ phyi rol na yang ma yin/ rgyang ring po na yang ma yin/ drung na yang ma yin no/ /zhes de 'di snyam du sems te/ gang du nam
yang spyad pa med par bya'o/ /snyam pa 'di ni/ ma 'ongs pa gtong ba'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /de la byang chub sems dpa'i da ltar byung ba gtong ba gang zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras
dag /'di la byang chub sems dpa' rgyal po chen po bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang / sum cu rtsa gsum dang / mtshe ma dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan
'phrul dbang byed dang / tshangs pa dang / tshangs ris dang / tshangs lha nye phan dang / tshangs pa kun 'khor dang / tshangs chen dang / snang ba dang / 'od chung dang / tshad med snang ba dang /
shin tu snang ba dang / dge ba dang / chung dge dang / tshad med dge ba dang / dge rgyas dang / che ba dang / chung che dang / tshad med che ba dang / 'bras bu che ba dang / mi che ba dang / mi
gdung ba dang / shin tu mthong ba dang / gya nom snang ba dang / 'og min gyi lha rnams nas nyan thos kyi phun sum tshogs pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi phun sum tshogs
pa dag kyang nyan te/ des de dag thos nas kyang rmongs par mi 'gyur/ shin tu rmongs par mi 'gyur/ rab tu rmongs par mi 'gyur/ zhum par mi 'gyur/ kun nas zhum par mi
'gyur| rnam par zhum par mi 'gyur/ shin tu zhum par mi 'gyur/ dma' bar mi 'gyur te/ 'di ltar de ni/ shes pas 'du byed du gtogs pa thams cad rmi lam lta bur
mngon du byed do/ /de 'di snyam du gang sbyin par bya ba 'di ni/ su'i yang ma yin no/ /snyam ste/ ngan song gi lam nye bar gnas pa bzlog par bya
ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad bsgrub pa'i phyir chos ston kyang byang chub sems dpa'i lam mngon du gyur pa'i phyir de la sems rgyu ba med de/ 'di ni/ da ltar byung
ba gtong ba zhes bya'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa'i shin tu gtong ba gang zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems can mig dang mi ldan pa dang / rna ba dang mi ldan pa dang /
sna dang mi ldan pa dang / lce dang mi ldan pa dang / lus dang mi ldan pa grangs med pa zhig gis 'di skad du bdag cag la ci med pa de khyod kyis byin la/ nged mi ldan pa med
par gyis shig /khyod ni/ bskal pa grangs med par mi ldan par 'dug cig /ces zer na/ byang chub sems dpa' ni/ de thos ma thag tu sems can de dag mi ldan pa med
par sgrub ste/ bskal pa grangs med par dbang po dang mi ldan pa de yang nyams su len to/ /de ma'i lto na 'dug pa'i tshe ji lta bur spyod pa dang / mer mer por 'dug pa ji
lta bu yin pa dang / rdos par gyur pa ji lta bu yin pa dang / mkhregs par gyur pa ji lta bu yin pa dang / dbang po grub pa ji lta bu yin pa dang / skyes pa ji lta bu yin pa dang /
rga ba ji lta bu yin pa dang / na ba ji lta bu yin pa dang / shi ba ji lta bu yin pa dang / lus kyi rang bzhin thog ma dang / bar ma dang / tha ma ji lta ba bzhin du yang dag par rab tu shes so//
ngom du mi rung ba dang / ngo tsha skye ba/ 'phags pa ma yin pa/ dri mi zhim pa/ rjen pa'i dri can/ ror 'gyur ba/ rus pa bsags pa/ sha dang khrag gis g.yogs pa/ rma dgu nas rtag tu
zag pa'o/ /zhes nas de ni/ sems bskyed pa gcig tsam gyis kyang de don du gnyer bar mi sems te/ sems bskyed pa gcig gis kyang chags pa mi skyed do/ /de shin tu gtong ba
des 'dzin pa med pa'i yid dang ldan pa yin te/ lus 'di ni/ de ltar snying po med pa yin na/ bdag gis lus 'di snying po med par mngon par mthong bzhin du lus la chags par
ji ltar bya/ sems can 'di dag gi bsam pa de bzhin yongs su tshim par bya'o/ /lus snying po med pa 'dis 'gro ba thams cad kyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /'gro ba
thams cad kyis kyang shes par bya'o/ /ye shes kyi tshogs gang yang rung ba la yang mi gnas pa'i tshul gyis gzhag par bya'o/ /zhes nas lus kyi 'du shes kyang med/ sems kyi 'du
shes kyang med de/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i gtong ba'i gtor te/ drug pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de la byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes kyi
gter gang zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' gzugs rab tu shes so/ /gzugs kun 'byung ba rab tu shes so/ /gzugs kyi 'gog pa rab tu shes so/ /
gzugs 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ /de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba
bzhin du rab tu shes so/ /rnam par shes pa'i kun 'byung ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ /rnam par shes pa 'gog pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes
so| |rnam par shes pa 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ /ma rig pa rab tu shes so/ /ma rig pa'i kun 'byung ba rab tu shes so/ /ma rig
pa 'gog pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ /ma rig pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ /sred pa rab tu shes so/ /sred
pa kun 'byung ba rab tu shes so/ /sred pa 'gog pa rab tu shes so/ /sred pa 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ /nyan thos rab tu shes so/
nyan thos kyi chos rab tu shes so/ /nyan thos kyi kun 'byung ba rab tu shes so/ /nyan thos kyi mya ngan las 'da' ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ /rang sangs
rgyas rab tu shes so/ /rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rab tu shes so/ /rang sangs rgyas kyi kun 'byung ba rab tu shes so/ /rang sangs rgyas kyi yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba yang dag pa ji lta
bzhin du rab tu shes so/ /byang chub sems dpa' rab tu shes so/ /byang chub sems dpa'i chos rab tu shes so/ /byang chub sems dpa'i kun 'byung ba rab tu shes so/ /byang chub sems
dpa'i yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ /ji ltar shes she na/ las dang / las kyi rnam par smin pa dang / bya ba dang / mngon par 'du byed pa
dang / gso ba dang / gsog dang / snying po med pa dang / bdag med par rab tu shes te/ chos gang yang snying po can du shes pa med do/ /chos gang la'ang rang bzhin du 'dogs pa
med de| ngo bo nyid kyi mthas gtugs par thams cad rab tu shes so/ /sems can rnams la yang de bzhin nyid kyi don du chos ston te/ de ci ston ce na/ 'jig pa med pa'i
phyir chos ston te/ gang 'jig pa med pa'i phyir zhe na/ gzugs 'jig pa med pa'i phyir/ tshor ba 'jig pa med pa'i phyir/ 'du shes 'jig pa med pa'i phyir/ 'du byed 'jig
pa med pa'i phyir/ rnam par shes pa 'jig pa med pa'i phyir chos ston to/ /ma rig pa 'jig pa med pa'i phyir/ nyan thos kyi chos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos dang / byang chub
sems dpa'i chos 'jig pa med pa'i phyir chos ston to/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos ni/ ma skyes pa/ 'dus ma byas pa/ byed pa po med pa/ rtsod pa med pa/
gnas pa med pa/ ma skyes pa/ mi 'byung ba/ ma blangs pa/ nye bar ma blangs pa/ byed pa med pa ste/ de shes rab kyi gter de lta bu dang ldan pas las gron chung ngus chos thams
cad la mkhas pa/ gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ /shes rab kyi gter de yang mi zad pa yin te/ de yang shin tu bstan pa bcus mi
zad pa yin no/ /bcu gang zhe na/ thos pa la mkhas pas mi zad do/ /dge ba'i bshes gnyen la bsnyen pas mi zad do/ /tshig rab tu dbye ba la mkhas pas mi zad do/ /chos
kyi dbyings la 'jug pa mngon par sgrub pas mi zad do/ /rgyan gcig pa'i ye shes kyi rjes su zhugs pas mi zad do/ /bsod nams thams cad shin tu bsags pas mi
zad do| |skyo ba med pa mngon par sgrub pas mi zad do/ /gzungs thams cad kyi sgor zhugs pas mi zad do/ /sems can thams cad kyi skad dang sgra dang brjod pa sna tshogs
kyi phyir mi zad do/ /'gro ba thams cad kyi yid gnyis dang / nem nur dang / the tshom yang dag par gcod pa'i phyir mi zad do/ /sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa thams cad
yongs su bstan pas sems can thams cad nye bar 'tsho ba dang / yongs su smin par bya ba dang / gdul ba'i spyod pa shin tu rtogs pa'i phyir mi zad de/ mi zad pa shin tu bstan
pa bcu po de dag gis shes rab kyi gter de mi zad pa yin no/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes rab kyi gter yin te/ de la gnas pa'i
byang chub sems dpa' rnams shes rab dang / ye shes bla na med pa rnam par 'tshang rgya'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dran pa'i gter gang
zhe na| kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' dran pa dang ldan pa yin te/ de yang rgyud rmongs pa med pa'i dran pas sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran te/ 'di ltar tshe
gcig kyang rjes su dran no/ /tshe gnyis dang / gsum dang / bzhi dang / lnga dang / tshe brgya dang / stong dang / tshe brgya phrag du ma dang / tshe stong phrag du ma dang / tshe brgya stong phrag du
ma dang / 'jig pa'i bskal pa'am/ 'du ba'i bskal pa'am/ 'jig pa dang 'du ba'i bskal pa'am/ 'jig pa'i bskal pa du ma dang / 'du ba'i bskal pa du ma dang / 'du
ba dang 'jig pa'i bskal pa du ma dang / bskal pa brgya dang / bskal pa stong dang / bskal pa brgya stong dang / bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dang / bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig
brgya stong tshad med pa dang / bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig grangs med pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ mtshungs pa med pa/ kun tu mtha' yas pa/ mu med pa/
sa mtshams med pa/ gzhal du med pa/ brjod du med pa gnyis dang / gsum dang / bzhi dang / lnga dang / gzhung de bzhin du brjod du med pa yang brjod du med pa dang / sangs
rgyas skye bar lung bstan pa shin tu brjod pa gcig dang / gnyis dang / gsum dang / bzhi dang / lnga nas sangs rgyas skye bar lung bstan pa shin tu brjod du med pa brjod du
med pa'i yang brjod du med pa dang / sangs rgyas skye ba gcig bstan te/ de dang mtshams sbyar ba'i lung bstan pa gcig dang / gnyis dang / gsum dang / bzhi dang / lnga
nas sangs rgyas skye ba shin tu bstan te/ de dang mtshams sbyor ba lung bstan pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa dang / mdo'i sde gcig dang / gnyis dang / gsum dang /
bzhi dang / lnga nas brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i bar dang / dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa'i sde dang / lung bstan pa'i sde dang / tshigs su bcad pa'i sde dang / gleng
gzhi'i sde dang / ched du brjod pa'i sde dang / 'di ltar 'das pa'i sde dang / skyes pa rabs kyi sde dang / shin tu rgyas pa'i sde dang / chos rmad du byung ba bstan pa'i sde dang /
man ngag bstan pa'i sde gcig dang / gnyis dang / gsum dang / bzhi dang / lnga nas brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i bar dang / 'khor 'dus pa gcig dang / chos kyi mtshams
sbyar ba gcig nas chos kyi mtshams sbyar ba brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i bar dang / dbang po sna tshogs gcig nas dbang po sna tshogs brjod du med pa'i yang brjod
du med pa'i bar dang / dbang po rnam pa tha dad pa sna tshogs gcig nas dbang po tha dad pa sna tshogs brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i bar dang / nyon mongs pa sna tshogs
gcig nas nyon mongs pa sna tshogs brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i bar dang / ting nge 'dzin sna tshogs gcig nas ting nge 'dzin sna tshogs brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i bar
dag kyang dran pa dag pa/ dang ba/ rnyog pa med pa/ rnam par gsal ba/ rdul med pa/ rdul dang bral ba/ dri ma med pa/ 'od gsal ba/ sang sang po/ /bsgribs pa med pas rjes su dran no/ /byang chub
sems dpa'i dran pa de ni/ 'jig rten gyi 'khrul pas mi 'phrog pa yin/ phas kyi rgol ba thams cad kyis nye bar nyon mongs par mi nus pa yin/ sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba shin
tu sbyangs pa yin/ 'jig rten gyi chos thams cad kyis ma gos pa yin/ bdud dang mu stegs can dmigs pa la gnas pa gzhan gyis mi chod pa yin/ tshe rabs kun tu
'pho ba'i lus shin tu bstan pa thams cad kyis brjod par mi nus pa yin/ sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dang / da ltar byung ba'i mthas rnam
par mi chod pa yin/ 'jig rten gyi khams su skye ba dang gnas pa thams cad kyis skyon du ma gyur pa yin/ sangs rgyas skyes pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa shin
tu bstan pa thams cad kyis thogs pa med pa yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi rjes su song ba yin te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa'
rnams kyi dran pa'i gter te/ brgyad pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rtogs pa'i gter gang zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /'di
la byang chub sems dpa' rtogs pa dang ldan pa yin te/ de yang yi ge de bzhin gzhan ma yin pas mdo'i tshul gyi chos ston to/ /de ni/ tshe'i rgyud gcig pa yang yongs su
'dzin to/ /tshe'i rgyud brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i bar du yongs su 'dzin to/ /sangs rgyas kyi mtshan gcig kyang yongs su 'dzin to/ /sangs rgyas kyi mtshan
brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i bar du yang yongs su 'dzin to/ /bskal pa grangs med pa bstan pa gcig kyang yongs su 'dzin to/ /bskal pa grangs med pa
bstan pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i bar du yang yongs su 'dzin to/ /de bzhin gshegs par lung bstan pa brjod pa gcig kyang yongs su 'dzin to/ /de bzhin gshegs
par lung bstan par brjod pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i bar du yang yongs su 'dzin to/ /mdo gcig kyang yongs su 'dzin to/ /mdo brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med
pa'i bar du yang yongs su 'dzin to/ /'dus pa gcig kyang yongs su 'dzin to/ /'dus pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i bar du yang yongs su 'dzin to/ /chos kyi mtshams
sbyar ba gcig kyang yongs su 'dzin to/ /chos kyi mtshams sbyar ba brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i bar du yang yongs su 'dzin to/ /dbang po rnam pa tha dad pa sna tshogs
gcig kyang yongs su 'dzin to/ /dbang po rnam pa tha dad pa sna tshogs brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i bar du yang yongs su 'dzin to/ /nyon mongs pa sna tshogs gcig kyang
yongs su 'dzin to/ /nyon mongs pa sna tshogs brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i bar du yang yongs su 'dzin to/ /ting nge 'dzin sna tshogs gcig kyang yongs su 'dzin to/ /
ting nge 'dzin sna tshogs brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i bar du yang yongs su 'dzin to/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
po rnams kyi rtogs pa'i gter te/ mi zad pa/ kun tu mtha' yas pa/ dgang dka' ba/ gting rnyed par dka' ba/ sgrub par dka' ba/ mi 'phrog pa/
thug pa med pa/ bdag nyid che ba'i sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi rjes su song ba ste/ 'di ni/ gter dgu pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi blo
gros kyi gter gang zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /'di la byang chub sems dpa' yang dag par rtogs par byed pa'i rtogs pa dang ldan zhing blo gros dang ldan pa yin te/ mdo
sde thams cad dang mi 'gal bas de chos ston pa'i tshe dngos po yongs su ldog pa gcig kyang brtsams te chos ston pa nas dngos po yongs su ldog pa brjod du med pa'i yang
brjod du med pa'i bar du chos ston to/ /sangs rgyas kyi mtshan gcig nas tshul de bzhin du brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i bar dang / 'jig rten gyi khams gcig
dang / sangs rgyas su lung bstan pa gcig dang / mdo gcig dang / 'khor 'dus pa gcig dang / chos kyi mtshams sbyar ba gcig dang / dbang po rnam pa tha dad pa sna
tshogs gcig dang / nyon mongs pa sna tshogs gcig dang / ting nge 'dzin sna tshogs gcig kyang brtsams te chos ston pa nas ting nge 'dzin sna tshogs brjod du med pa'i yang
brjod du med pa'i bar du brtsams te chos ston to/ /nyi ma gcig kyang zad par byed cing chos ston pa nas zla ba phyed dang / zla ba gcig dang / lo gcig dang / lo brgya dang / lo stong dang /
lo brgya phrag stong dang / bskal pa dang / bskal pa brgya dang / bskal pa stong dang / bskal pa brgya phrag stong dang / bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong dang / bskal pa tshad med
pa dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / bskal pa dpag tu med pa dang / grangs med pa dang / mtshungs pa med pa dang / kun tu mtha' yas pa dang / mu med pa dang / sa mtshams med
pa dang / gzhal du med pa dang / brjod du med pa dag kyang zad par byed cing chos ston na/ tshig dang yi ge gcig brtsams kyang don dang / tshig dang / yi ge'i mthar thug pa med de/
de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i gter bcu rab tu thob pa'i phyir te/ gter de dag thob pas gzungs kyi snying po'i sgo chos thams cad
la yang dag par gzhol ba zhes bya ba/ gzungs brgya stong grangs med pa'i 'khor can mngon du gyur te/ de gzungs kyi 'khor brgya stong grangs med pa ston par byed do/ /chos snang
ba shin tu bstan pa thob pas sems can thams cad la chos ston to/ /chos kyi sgo snang ba'i chos can lce yangs pas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du mngon par go bar byed
pa dang / dbyangs kyi yan lag la mkhas pas 'gro ba thams cad tshim par byed pa dang / dbang po ji lta ba bzhin du mgu bar byed pa dang / nyon
mongs pa dang / kun nas 'khor ba thams cad rnam par bzlog pa dang / sgra dang tshig rnam pa tha dad pa thams cad la rab tu zhugs pa dang / yi ge thams cad kyi spobs pas
ston pa'i rjes su song ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi sa bon grung po yongs su shes pa'i bsam pa can du byed pas chos ston te/ thogs par mi byed do/ /skyo bar mi 'gyur
ro| |de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpas nam mkha'i khams dang / chos kyi dbyings mtha' dang dbus med pa rgyas par byed pa'i lus rab tu thob pa'i phyir
te| kye rgyal pa'i sras dag /'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i gter bcus blo gros mi zad pa/ thug pa med pa/ 'dres pa med pa/ rnam par mi chod pa/ rgyun gcad par mi nus
pa| phyir mi ldog pa/ gting rnyed par dka' ba/ ring du gyur pa/ sgo kun dang ldan pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos la zhugs pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /bcu po de dag
ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gter te/ mi zad pa'i rnam pa bcus mi zad pa yin no/ /bla na med pa yin no/ /mthar rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur ba yin no/ /
bcu gang zhe na/ sems can thams cad kyi nye bar 'tsho ba dang / sngon gyi smon lam legs par yongs su bsngos pa dang / bskal pa thams cad kyi grangs gcad du med pa dang / nam
mkha'i dbyings dang mnyam pa nyid du khong du chud pa'i phyir sems tshad med pa dang / 'dus byas kyis ma gos pa'i phyir 'dus ma byas la yongs su bsngos pa dang / de ma thag pa'i yul du
gyur pas chos thams cad zad mi shes pa dang / smon lam chen po tha dad pa med pa dang / spyod pa la gnas pa'i stobs shin tu 'dzin pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyis yongs
su bzung ba dang / chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bur 'jug pa mtha' dang dbus med pa la zhugs pa ste/ mi zad pa'i rnam pa bcu po 'di dag gis 'jig rten gyi bya ba thams cad kyi mthar
phyin pa zad mi shes pa'i gter chen por 'gyur ro/ /shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba las/ gter mi zad pa bcu bstan pa'i le'u ste/ nyi shu
bdun pa'o// //bam po nyi shu dgu pa/ de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad dang / de bzhin du lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs
dang / byang phyogs dang / byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams dang / shar lho'i phyogs mtshams dang / lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams dang / nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang / 'og dang
steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na yang gling bzhi pa 'di la sogs pa gling re re na yang de bzhin gshegs rnams bzhugs par snang ngo / /
byang chub sems dpa' de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis chos ston to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs kyi drung na yang 'khod par shes so/ /bcom
ldan 'das kyis kyang rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa de phyir ma brtul/ byang chub kyi shing drung yang phyir ma brtul/ ri rab kyi rtse mo yang phyir ma brtul bar rab mtshe ma'i
gnas nas dga' ldan gyi gnas kyi lha'i rgyal po rab dga' ldan gyi khang pa rin po che'i rgyan ces bya ba gang na bder gshegs par snang ngo / /ji ltar gling bzhi pa 'di na bcom
ldan 'das dga' ldan gyi gnas su gshegs par snang ba de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi gling bzhi pa dag na yang bcom ldan 'das dga' ldan gyi gnas
su gshegs par snang ste/ byin gyi rlabs snga ma de dag kyang ma 'khrug par snang ngo / /de nas lha'i rgyal po rab dga' ldan gyis rgyang ma nas bcom ldan 'das khang pa rin
po che thams cad kyis brgyan par gshegs pa mthong nas rings pa'i gzugs su khang pa rin po che thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i nang du de bzhin gshegs pa'i seng+ge'i gdan
nor bu rin po che las byas pa/ lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i rgyu las bsgrubs pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyi rgyu las yongs su grub pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs/
kyis byung ba/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med pa mang pos byung ba/ sangs rgyas thams cad las byung ba'i chos dkar po las byung ba/ bsod nams kyi
stobs mtha' yas pa sna tshogs thams cad dang ldan pa/ kha na ma tho ba med pa'i rnam par smin pa thams cad kyis rnam par dag pa/ mi mthun pa med pa'i 'jig rten las
'das pa'i chos kyis byung ba/ gos pa med pa/ 'gro ba thams cad du byung ba/ thub pa med pa/ 'gro ba thams cad kyis blta na sdug pa/ bog re bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus brgyan
pa| gser gyi dra ba bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu kun tu bres pa/ me tog gi bla re bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu kun nas bres pa/ phreng ba'i bla re bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu kun nas lding ba/
spos kyi bla re bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus spos kun tu 'thul bar sbyar ba/ rin po che'i bla re bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu steng nas bkab pa/ me tog gi gdugs bye ba brgya stong
phrag bcus kun nas bsgrengs pa/ rin po che'i gdugs bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus kun nas bkab pa/ gdan bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mngon par bting ba/ rin po che'i pu shu
bya ba brgya stong phrag bcu rgyan du bsgrubs pa/ nor bu'i dra ba bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu shin tu rnam par phye bas g.yogs par byas pa/ rin po che'i dra ba bye ba brgya
stong phrag bcus 'khor kun tu g.yogs pa/ rin po che'i phreng ba 'chang ba'i dra ba bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu shin tu dbyangs pas bkab pa/ lhab lhub kyi dra ba bye ba brgya stong
phrag bcus shin tu klubs shing brgyan pa/ gdugs kyi dra ba bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus kun nas khebs par bkab pa/ gos sna tshogs kyi dra ba bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus
sna tshogs su g.yogs pa/ rin po che'i pad+mo'i dra ba bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus shin tu rgyas par bkram pa/ spos rin po che'i dra ba bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu 'thul zhing yid
du 'ong bar dri zhim pa/ rin po che'i bla re chen po'i dra ba bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu'i rgyan chen po brgyan par bres pa/ rin po che'i dril bu'i rgyan gyi bla re bye ba brgya stong phrag
bcus yid du 'ong ba'i sgra phyung ba/ tsan+dan rin po che'i mdog lta bu'i bla re bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus yid du 'ong bar bkab pa/ rin po che'i me tog sna tshogs kyi bla re bye
ba brgya stong phrag bcu me tog shin tu rgyas pa/ gos kha dog mtha' yas pa'i bla re bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus sna tshogs su snang bar bkab pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i
bla re bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus sna tshogs su kun nas bkab pa/ gdugs kyi bla re kha dog rnam pa sna tshogs bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus rab tu g.yogs shing rnam pa sna tshogs
su snang ba/ gser gyi bla re bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus yid du 'ong bar bkab cing rnam par dag par byas pa/ bai DUR+Ya'i bla re bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus lha rdzas dri ma med cing
shin tu dag par byas pa/ snying po sna tshogs can gyi bla re bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus rnam pa sna tshogs kyis bla rer bkab pa/ rin po che thams cad kyi bla re bye ba brgya stong
phrag bcu'i nor bu rin po che bzang pos shin tu mdzes shing khebs par bkab pa/ rin po che'i rgyan bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus phyogs thams cad bkang ba/ rin po che'i
gzugs brnyan gyi bla re bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus shin tu rnam par che zhing mdzes par brgyan pa/ rin po che'i phreng ba bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus phreng ba kun tu 'brel bar
brgyan pa/ spos kyi phreng ba bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus mchod pa la tshul dang mthun pa'i spos kyi dri zhim par byas pa/ lha la mchog tu bya ba'i spos dang bdug spos bye ba khrag
khrig brgya stong phrag bcus kha dog mtha' yas pa dang / dri zhim por btul ba'i mchod pa can/ lha la mchog tu bya ba'i lhab lhub kyi rgyud bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu mngon
par klubs shing dag par byas pa/ rin po che'i me tog gi phreng ba bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus rin po che'i thams cad kyi rgyud du mdzes par byas pa/ dpal
gyi snying po'i phreng ba bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus rin po che sna tshogs su brgyan pa/ nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyi phreng ba bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus rin po che thams cad kyi rgyan
du rnam par dag pa/ nor bu rin po che rgya mtsho'i rgyan gyi phreng ba bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus gdan gyi snying po shin tu brgyan pa/ dbang po'i rdo rje bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus shin
tu spras pa/ rin po che'i snam bu bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu kun tu sbyangs pa/ 'jig rten mtha' yas pa'i dbang po'i nor bu rin po che bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus shin tu bzang
bar brgyan pa/ gser gyi snying po bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus shin tu bsgrubs shing dag par byas pa/ nor bu rin po che rnam par snang ba bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus rdul med
par snang bar byas pa/ nor bu rin po che brgya byin mngon par chags pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus snying po mtha' yas par snang bar brgyan pa/ nor bu rin po che dpa'
pa'i rgyal mtshan bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus shin tu 'bar bar bsgrubs pa/ nor bu rin po che snang ba'i 'od zer bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus 'od zer snang bar byas pa/
nor bu rin po che lha la mchog tu bya ba bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus skar khung gi shar bu mdzes par bres pa/ nor bu rin po che bsod nams kyis dag pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus
kha dog gsal bar gyur pa/ dngul gyi rta babs bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus bres pa'i snying po dkar po rab tu rnam par phye ba/ 'gro ba rgya mtsho'i zla gam bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus
sbubs shin tu bsgrubs pa/ nor bu rin po che dri ma med pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus blta na mdzes par shin tu brgyan pa/ nor bu rin po che sems kyi rgyal po bye ba brgya stong phrag
bcus 'dab chags yid du 'ong zhing dga' bar kun tu brgyan pa/ nor bu rin po che seng+ge'i gdong bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus shin tu spras pa'i mchod pa dang ldan pa/ nor bu rin po che
'dzam bu'i rgyal mtshan bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus mthu brtan par shin tu brtan pa/ nor bu rin po che snying po dag pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus rnam par snang zhing mdzes par
byas pa| nor bu rin po che dbang po'i rgyal mtshan bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus snang ba'i gdugs su bres pa/ nor bu rin po che dngul gyi snying po bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus nang rnam
pa sna tshogs su bkram pa/ nor bu rin po che ri rab kyi rgyal mtshan bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus snying po shin tu brgyan pa/ mu tig gi phreng ba bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus kha
dog mdzes par bres pa/ bai DUR+Ya'i phreng ba bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus dra bar bres pa/ mu tig dmar po'i phreng ba bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus rnam
pa sna tshogs su rnam par phye ba/ nor bu yid du 'ong ba'i phreng ba bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu rnam par sna tshogs su bkod pa/ rin po che shin tu snang ba'i phreng ba bye ba brgya stong
phrag bcus shin tu rnam par bye zhing rab tu bzung ba/ rin po che 'bru sna tshogs kyi phreng ba bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus lus shin tu brgyan pa/ mu tig dmar po'i phreng ba bye
ba brgya stong phrag bcus yid du 'ong bar snang ba/ nor bu rin po che kha dog du ma'i phreng ba bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus snying po kha dog sna tshogs shing kha dog mtha' yas pa'i
mthar phyin pa/ dga' bar byed pa'i phreng ba bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcus dag par sbyangs pa/ nor bu rin po che dpal gyi 'od zer gyi phreng ba bye ba brgya stong phrag
bcus dpal chen po rab tu thob pa thob par gyur pa/ nor bu'i gzugs bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus phyogs shin tu spa bar brgyan pa/ rin po che'i dbang po'i 'khor bye
ba brgya stong phrag bcu la gnas yongs su 'dzin pa/ dus dang mthun pa'i tsan+dan bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du dri zhim pos rgyas par
byas pa| rim gro byed pa'i mi'i tshogs bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du rjes su song ba/ spos kyi thum po shin tu che ba bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus kun tu
rgyas pa| |gzhan gyis pham pa med pa'i spos bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu'i dri kun tu rgyas pa/ spos kyi gzugs bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu'i dri kun tu 'byung ba/ yid du 'ong ba'i spos
bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu'i dri rab tu 'byung ba/ snang ba ston pa'i spos bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu'i dris 'gro ba kun tu gang ba/ dri sna tshogs kha dog mtha' yas pa bye ba brgya stong
phrag bcus sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du phyir mi ldog par zhim pa/ byug pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus shin tu byugs pa/ tsan+dan rnam pa tha dad pa'i spos bye ba brgya stong
phrag bcus tshon du bskus shing mdzes pa/ spos rnam pa tha dad pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus dri zhim por shin tu bsgos pa/ a ga ru nag po pad+mo'i snying po bye ba brgya stong
phrag bcus sprin gyi snying por byas pa/ bdug spos bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus shin tu bdugs shing yog pa/ bdug spos kyi 'od zer bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu dbang po zhi bar
zhim pa| spos kun tu rgyu ba bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu yid du 'ong bar zhim pa/ spos kyi 'od zer bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus ro thams cad du bdugs shing dri zhim pa/ spos
rnam par tshor bar byed pa'i dam pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus dbang po mi 'khrug par spos thams cad kyis mchod par byas pa/ spos kyi rgyal po
gzhal du med pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus spos kyi gzugs rnam pa sna tshogs su shin tu brgyan pa/ lha rdzas kyi me tog gi sprin gyi char bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu mngon
par 'bab pa/ lha rdzas kyi spos kyi sprin bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu mngon par 'bab pa/ lha rdzas kyi phye ma'i sprin bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu mngon par 'bab pa/ lha rdzas kyi
pad+mo'i sprin gyi char bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu mngon par 'bab pa/ lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i me tog gi sprin gyi char bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu'i char mngon par 'bab pa/ lha
rdzas kyi ut+pa la'i sprin gyi char bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu kun tu yog par 'bab pa/ lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i me tog gi char bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu rab tu 'bab pa/ lha
rdzas kyi me tog puN+Da rI ka'i sprin gyi char bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu shin tu 'bab pa/ lha rdzas kyi me tog man+dA ra ba'i sprin gyi char bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu'i tshogs chen po
rab tu 'bab pa/ lha rdzas kyi me tog thams cad kyi sprin gyi char bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu rgyun du 'bab pa/ na bza'i sprin bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus bar snang kha dog sna
tshogs su gyur pa/ nor bu rin po che'i sprin gyi char bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu kun tu snang bar 'bab pa/ gdugs kyi sprin gyi char bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu kun nas yog par 'bab
pa| ba dan gyi sprin gyi char bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu kha dog sna tshogs du mar 'bab pa/ lha rdzas kyi cod pan gyi sprin gyi char bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu sna tshogs su 'bab pa/ lhab lhub
kyi sprin gyi char bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu shin tu klubs par 'bab pa/ lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i sprin gyi char bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu kha dog sna tshogs su 'bab pa/ lha rdzas kyi rin
po che'i sen mo do'i sprin gyi char bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu rgyan chen por 'bab pa/ lha rdzas kyi tsan+dan gyi sprin gyi char bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu tsan+dan rnam pa sna tshogs kyi kha dog
du mar 'bab pa/ lha rdzas kyi a ga ru dang / tsan+dan gyi sprin gyi char bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu shin tu yog par 'thul zhing 'bab pa/ rin po che'i rgyal mtshan bye ba brgya stong
phrag bcu shin tu bsgrengs pa/ rin po che'i ba dan bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu shin tu dbyangs pa/ snam bu rin po che'i lda ldi bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu shin tu bres pa/ spos kyi
snod bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu nas shin tu 'thul ba/ rin po che'i phreng ba'i chun po bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu shin tu dbyangs pa/ rin po che'i sil snyan bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu
shin tu 'khrol zhing 'dzin pa/ lha rdzas kyi rdul yab bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu rnam par rlob cing 'dzin pa/ rin po che'i dril bu'i dra ba bye ba brgya stong
phrag bcu shin tu 'khrol ba/ rin po che'i stegs bu bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus kun nas bskor ba/ rin po che'i shing ta la'i phreng ba bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu kun nas 'greng ba/
rin po che'i phreng ba bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus lda ldir brgyan pa/ rin po che'i shing bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus kun nas yog cing 'khor ba/ khang pa brtsegs pa rin po che'i
rgyan can bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus nang gi rgyan du dkrigs pa/ rin po che'i khang bu bye ba brgya stong gi sgo la rin po che thams cad kyi phreng ba bkye ba/ gser gyi dril bu bye ba
brgya stong phrag bcu 'khrol ba'i sgra yid du 'ong bar 'byung ba/ dpal gyi be'u bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu'i phreng ba rab tu dbyangs pas yongs su dag pa/ rin po che'i bkra
shis bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu'i mtshan bzang po byung ba/ gser gyi dam pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu'i gser gyi lcag bod kyis kun tu bltas pa/ rin po che'i gdugs
gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu rin po che thams cad kyi yu bas bzung ba/ rin po che'i rgyan bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus rin po che'i rgyan gyi dra ba
thams cad du rnam par bres pa/ rin po che'i 'od zer bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu 'od zer sna tshogs su rab tu 'phro ba/ snang ba bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus kun tu snang bar byed pa/ 'od
bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu rab tu 'tsher ba/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi snying po bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus gzugs rab tu mdzes shing lus shin tu 'phags pa/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bye
ba brgya stong phrag bcus kha dog du mar bsgrubs pa/ spos kyi 'od zer bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu rab rib med par snang ba/ lha rdzas kyi pad+mo'i dam pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus rab
tu bsgrubs shing snying po shin tu 'phags pa/ rin po che'i dra ba bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus snying po kun nas yog par byas pa/ me tog gi dra ba bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu kun nas rgyas
par bkram pa/ spos kyi dra ba bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu'i dri sna tshogs kyis kun nas yog pa/ lha rdzas kyi gdan rin po che bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu mdzes par bting ba/ lha rdzas
kyi gos rin po che bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus mdzes par bkram pa/ lha rdzas kyi gos kha dog sngon po bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu shin tu brgyan par bting ba/ lha rdzas kyi gos
kha dog ser bo bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu rgyan chen por bting ba/ lha rdzas kyi gos kha dog dmar po bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu lha'i dga' bar bting ba/ lha rdzas kyi gos kha dog
sna tshogs bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu gos kyi rgyan du bting ba/ lha rdzas kyi rin po che sna tshogs kyi gos rnam pa sna tshogs bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu kha dog
legs par bting ba/ spos sna tshogs kyis yongs su bsgos pa'i gos bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu gos bzang por bting ba/ rin po che rmad du byung ba thams cad kyi gos bye
ba brgya stong phrag bcus yid du 'ong ba'i rgyan du bting ba/ gos dkar po sna tshogs bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus bla gab tu bkab pa/ lha rdzas kyi dril bu'i rgyal mtshan bye ba
brgya stong phrag bcus yid du 'ong ba'i sgra phyung ba/ gser gyi dra ba'i rgyal mtshan bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu sgra shin tu 'byin cing yongs su bzung ba/ lha rdzas kyi snam bu
rin po che'i rgyal mtshan bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus rgyal mtshan gyi dra ba'i rgyan du brgyan pa/ spos kyi rgyal mtshan bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus spos kyi dra ba thams cad kyi
rgyan rnam par dag pa/ lha rdzas kyi me tog gi rgyal mtshan bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu me tog thams cad kyi char du 'bab pa/ lha rdzas kyi gos kyi rgyal mtshan bye ba brgya
stong phrag bcus gos thams cad du bskyod pa/ lha rdzas kyi nor bu rin po che'i rgyal mtshan bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus mdzes pa thams cad kyi rgyal mtshan dang ldan par
byas pa| lha rdzas kyi lhab lhub kyi rgyal mtshan bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus lhab lhub thams cad kyi rgyal mtshan rnam pa sna tshogs su gyur pa/ lha rdzas kyi phreng ba'i rgyal mtshan bye ba
brgya stong phrag bcu phyogs kun nas 'greng ba/ lha rdzas kyi gdugs kyi rgyal mtshan bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu dril bu thams cad 'khrol bas yid du 'ong zhing dga' ba'i sgra phyung

ba| lha rdzas kyi dung bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu'i sgra snyan pa phyung ba/ lha rdzas kyi rnga bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus rnga chen po'i sgra shin tu phyung ba/ lha rdzas kyi pi wang bye ba brgya stong
phrag bcus yid du 'ong zhing 'brel ba'i sgra phyung ba/ lha rdzas kyi kha sbyar bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus dbyangs chen por sgra bsgrags pa/ lha rdzas kyi sil snyan bye ba brgya stong phrag
bcu glu dang rol mor sbyar ba dang ldan pa/ lha rdzas kyi rol mo dbyangs kyi dam pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu'i sgra yid du 'ong bas sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du mngon par
grags par byas pa/ sprul pa'i rol mo bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad sgra brnyan gyi tshogs lta bur shes par byas pa/ lha rdzas kyi rnga bo che
bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu shin tu brdungs pa'i sgra phyung ba/ yid kyi rang bzhin gyi lha rdzas kyi rol mo bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus rol mo'i sgra yid du 'ong ba dang glu'i dbyangs
snyan pa phyung ba/ lha rdzas kyi rol mor gtogs pa sna tshogs bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus yid dga' ba dang zhi ba'i sgra phyung ba/ tshig gi rim pa yid du
'ong ba bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus bstod cing mchod pa/ bstod pa rgya chen po bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus dga' bar bstod cing mchod pa/ zab mor bstod pa bye ba brgya stong
phrag bcu shin tu bsgoms shing bstod pa/ bstod pa sna tshogs bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus las thams cad kyi rnam par smin pa las yongs su byung bar bstod pa/ phra bar
bstod pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du bstod pa/ sngon gyi spyod pas bstod pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu mngon par brjod de 'das pas bstod pa/
dge ba'i bstod pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus brtan cing bstod pa/ sngon gyi sangs rgyas bsnyen bkur ba'i bstod pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus rnam par dag par bstod pa/
chos kyi sgo'i bstod pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus mngon par byung bar bstod cing 'jigs pa med par bstod pa/ bstod pa rnam pa tha dad pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus byang chub
sems dpa' thams cad kyis mi zad par brjod cing bsngags te bstod pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa'i glu bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus byang chub sems dpa'i sa thams cad glur
brjod cing sbyar ba/ sangs rgyas kyi yon tan bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus thogs pa med par bstod pa/ sangs rgyas mthong ba'i glu bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu glu'i dbyangs su blangs pa/
chos zab mo'i glu bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus thogs pa med par chos kyi snang ba thams cad glu blangs te sbyar ba/ dbyangs rgya chen po'i glu bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus yid du 'ong ba'i
sgrar sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du bsgrags pa/ sems dang bsam pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu thogs pa med par glur blangs shing rna ba dang bar byas pa/ khams gsum du
gtogs pa'i glu bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin rnam par bstan pa/ dga' bar byed pa'i glu bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu thogs pa med pas dad pa dang
rim gro rab tu bskyed pa/ sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul gyi glu bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus chos kyi don thams cad gsal bar brjod cing sgra phyung ba/ gzungs kyi glu bye ba brgya stong
phrag bcus chos thams cad kyi tshig rab tu dbye ba la mkhas pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung gi ldem po dag rab tu rtogs par rnam par ston pa/ chos
thams cad kyi glu bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus chos thams cad kyi glu dang / rol mo dang / sil snyan gyi sgra phyung ba dang ldan pa/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dang po bskyed pa bye
ba brgya stong phrag bcu la thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems kyi stobs dang shugs mthong ma thag tu skye bar byed pa/ byang chub sems dpa' las
dang po pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu'i sems dga' zhing mos par byed pa/ byang chub sems dpa' rnal 'byor la spyod pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu'i mos pa rnam par sbyong
ba| byang chub sems dpa' cher skyes pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu'i theg pa chen po brtsams pa rgya cher byed pa/ byang chub sems dpa' sbyor ba dang ldan pa bye ba brgya
stong phrag bcu'i theg pa chen po brtsams pa yongs su rgyas par byed pa/ byang chub sems dpa' bsam pa dang ldan pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu'i byang chub sems dpa'i
spyod pa thams cad shin tu sbyong ba/ byang chub sems dpa' phyir mi ldog pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu'i byang chub sems dpa'i sa thams cad rnam par sbyong ba/
byang chub sems dpa' gzhon nur gyur pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu'i byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin thams cad snang bar byed pa/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab
bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu sangs rgyas kyi yul bsam gyis mi khyab pa la 'jug par byed pa/ byang chub sems dpa' dbang bskur ba bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong
phrag bcu de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs gzhal du med pa ston pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong thob par rnam par 'phrul ba/ byang chub sems
dpa'i mos pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu sgrub cing sbyong pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i dga' ba bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu shin tu skyes pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i dad pa bye ba brgya stong
phrag bcu mi shigs par rab tu gzhog pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i shugs bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu rnam par 'phel bar byed pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i rab tu dga' ba bye ba
brgya stong phrag bcu'i chos kyi grags pa rnam par 'phel bar byed pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos kyi don bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu'i ye shes gdon mi za ba nges par ston pa/
byang chub sems dpa'i dran pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu 'khrug pa med par sbyong ba/ byang chub sems dpa'i blo gros bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu'i ye shes gdon mi za ba skyed pa/
byang chub sems dpa'i rigs bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu la sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad 'dzin par byin gyis rlob pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i blo gros bye ba brgya stong phrag
