bcu yangs pa'i blo tshad med par ston pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i dad pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu rtsa ba brtan par byed pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i gtong ba bye ba brgya
stong phrag bcu gtong ba thams cad sbyin pas rnam par sbyong ba/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu tshad med pa'i tshul khrims
kyi pha rol tu phyin par sgrub pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i bzod pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu sems 'khrug pa med pas sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la bzod par 'jug pa/
byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu mtha' yas pa'i brtson 'grus su 'byung bar byed pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i bsam gtan bye ba brgya stong
phrag bcu tshad med pa'i bsam gtan rtogs pa'i snang bar byed pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par sgrub pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu shin
tu snang zhing shes par byed pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu'i 'byung ba rnam par sbyong ba/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos kyi sgo bye ba brgya
stong phrag bcu'i ye shes snang ba gsal bar byed pa/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas 'byams klas pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu'i chos kyi sgo snang ba byin gyis rlob pa/ phyogs
bcu 'byams klas pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu'i chos kyi tshul rmongs pa med cing gti mug med par smon pa/ chos kyi 'byung gnas bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu rab tu thob
par byed pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu 'byams klas pa la 'jug par byed pa/ chos kyi lus bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du 'gro bar byed
pa| de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu mngon par sgrub pa rab tu shes pa byed pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi tshul bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu mngon par sgrub
pa'i 'byung gnas su gyur pa/ chos 'byams klas pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu'i tshogs rab tu sgrub pa/ chos kyi ye shes bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad
mthong ba la rgyal mtshan du gyur pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu yang dag par ston pa'i spyod yul can/ lha'i dbang po bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu mngon
par dga' ba'i lus can/ klu'i dbang po bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu mi skyo bar lta ba/ gnod sbyin gyi dbang po bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu thal mo sbyor zhing spyi bo la bzhag pa/ dri za'i
dbang po bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu mi ngoms par mos pas ldang ba/ lha ma yin gyi dbang po bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu nga rgyal gyi yid yongs su chud pa/ nam mkha' lding gi dbang po
bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu'i kha nas dar shin tu dbyangs pa/ mi'am ci'i dbang po bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu sems rab tu dga' ba/ lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po bye ba brgya stong phrag
bcus dga' ba'i yid du blta ba/ tshangs pa'i dbang po bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu zhes sa phu dud du gnas pa/ 'jig rten gyi dbang po bye ba brgya stong phrag
bcus spyi bo dang lus kyis btud pa/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin la sogs pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus shin tu blta ba/ rab mtshe ma'i lha'i rgyal po la sogs pa bye ba brgya
stong phrag bcus dga' ba chen po'i sgra phyung ba/ rab dga' ldan gyi lha'i rgyal po la sogs pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus rab tu btud pa/ rab 'phrul dga'i lha'i rgyal po
la sogs pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus phyag bya ba/ dbang byed kyi lha'i rgyal po la sogs pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus thal mo sbyar ba/ tshangs pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus
blta ba| dbang phyug chen po bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus mngon par brjod pa/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus mngon par bstod pa/ lha'i bu mo bye ba brgya
stong phrag bcus shin tu mchod pa/ smon lam gyi lha'i bu bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu mngon par dga' ba/ sngon 'grogs pa'i lha bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus sgra phyung ba/
tshangs ris kyi lha'i bu bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus lus thams cad kyi phyag bya ba/ tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus spyi bos 'dud pa/ tshangs pa kun ris kyi lha
bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus bskor ba byas pa/ tshangs pa chen po bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus yon tan mtha' yas pa'i mthar phyin pa brgya phrag stong gis shin tu bstod pa'i sgra phyung ba/
kun snang dang ba'i lha bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus 'khor lngas phyag bya ba/ 'od chung gi lha bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus sangs rgyas skye ba shin tu dkon pa'i sgra bsgrags pa/ tshad med
'od kyi lha bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus sangs rgyas legs par gshegs so/ /zhes phyag bya ba/ kun snang dang ba'i lha bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus shin tu bstod cing mngon par dga' ba'i
sgra phyung ba/ dge ba'i lha bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus gzhal med khang dang ba can du 'phags pa/ 'od chung gi lha bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus sems dang ba'i lus kyis mngon par 'dud
pa| tshad med dge ba'i lha bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus sangs rgyas mthong bar mos shing rang gi lus kyis 'dud pa/ dge rgyas kyi lha bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus mchod pa dang rim
gro bya ba| che ba'i lha bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus dge ba'i rtsa ba rjes su dran par bya ba/ chung che'i lha bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus de bzhin gshegs pa che ba'i 'du shes rab tu
skyes shing blta ba/ tshad med che ba'i lha bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus dge ba'i chos rtogs shing rim gro cher bya ba/ 'bras bu che ba'i lha bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus lus shin
tu 'dud pa/ mi che ba'i lha bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus dad pa'i rtsa ba brtan par byas te mngon par brjod cing lus 'dud pa/ mi dros pa'i lha bye ba brgya
stong phrag bcus sangs rgyas kyi spyan snga nas thal mo sbyar zhing ngom mi shes par blta ba/ gya nom snang ba'i lha bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus mngon par bltas te lus 'dud
pa| shin tu mthong ba'i lha bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus sangs rgyas kyis bstan pa la ngom mi shes par lus dbul ba/ 'og min gyi lha bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus spyi bos
'dud cing mchod pa/ lha sna tshogs bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus dga' ba chen pos snang ba'i sgra phyung ba/ lha bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus shin tu bsam zhing bsgrubs te brgyan
pa| lha'i byang chub sems dpa' bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus sangs rgyas kyi gdan bsgrubs pa la byin gyi rlabs rgyun mi gcod pa/ lha'i byang chub sems dpa' chen po bye ba
brgya stong phrag bcu me tog thogs pa dang / spos thogs pa dang / phreng ba thogs pa dang / phye ma thogs pa dang / byug pa thogs pa dang / na bza' thogs pa dang / gdugs
thogs pa dang / rgyal mtshan thogs pa dang / ba dan thogs pa dang / rin po che thogs pa dang / phyang phrul thogs pa dang / lhab lhub thogs pas mngon par gtor zhing
char du phab ste rab tu dgye ba/ lha bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus lha'i khyim mngon par 'phags pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa'i pha rol tu phyin par bya ba/ lha'i gzhal med khang bye
ba brgya stong phrag bcu'i lha'i bus dad par bsu ba/ lha'i bu btsun pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus lhun shin tu bzung ba/ dbang bskur ba'i lha'i bu bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus lhun
kun nas bzung ba/ byang chub sems dpa'i sems bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu legs par sems shing spyod pa/ byang chub sems dpa' btsun pa'i sems bskyed pa bye ba brgya
stong phrag bcu'i yid dga' bar byed pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i dbang po bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu rab tu sim par byed pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i lhag pa'i bsam pa bye ba brgya
stong phrag bcu yongs su dag par byed pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i mos pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu rnam par dag par byed pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i las bye ba brgya stong phrag
bcu yang dag par sbyong ba/ byang chub sems dpa'i skyes pa'i rabs bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu rab tu ston par byed pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos kyi sgo bye ba brgya stong phrag
bcu rab tu snang bar byed pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu rab tu sgrub pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i ris bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu yongs su smin par
'dul pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus yang dag par byung ba/ sangs rgyas bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus byin gyis brlabs pa/ bsod
nams bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus yongs su grub pa/ lhag pa'i bsam pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus yongs su sbyangs pa/ smon lam bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus shin tu
dag par byas pa/ spyod pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus yang dag par skyes pa/ chos bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus nye bar brtan pa/ rnam par 'phrul pa bye ba brgya stong
phrag bcus rjes su song ba/ yon tan bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus shin tu 'phags pa bshams so/ /bam po sum cu pa/ ji ltar gling bzhi pa chen po 'di'i
dga' ldan gyi gnas su lha'i dbang po rab dga' ldan gyi khang pa nor bu rin po che thams cad kyi rgyan can du de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdan bting bar gyur pa de bzhin
du 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi gling bzhi pa chen po dag na'ang dga' ldan gyi gnas dag tu lha'i rgyal po rab dga' ldan gyi khang pa rin po che thams cad kyi rgyan
can dag tu rgyan 'di lta bu dang / tshul 'di lta bu dang / dad pa 'di lta bu dang / mos pa 'di lta bu dang / dga' ba 'di lta bu dang / rab tu dga' ba 'di lta bu dang / zhes
'di lta bu dang / rim gro 'di lta bu dang / spro ba 'di lta bu dang / nye bar sems pa 'di lta bus de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdan bting bar gyur to/ /de nas lha'i dbang po rab dga'
ldan gyis gdan bting nas zhe sa can gyi rim gro dang bcas par dga' ldan gyi ris su gtogs pa'i lha'i bu bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu dang lhan cig tu dong ste bcom ldan 'das
bsus nas me tog yon tan grangs med ba'i sprin gyi char ni/ rab tu phab/ spos yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i char ni/ shin tu phab/ phreng ba yon tan sna tshogs dang
ldan pa'i sprin ni/ rab tu bkye/ tsan+dan shin tu dag pa'i sprin yangs pa ni/ rab tu bkye/ gdugs rnam pa sna tshogs kyi sprin gyi char ni/ rab tu phab/ lha rdzas kyi gos rab
tu phra ba'i sprin ni/ rab tu bkye/ rin po che yid du 'ong ba mtha' yas pa thams cad kyi sprin gyi char ni/ rab tu phab/ sems shin tu dang bas lha rdzas kyi lhab lhub dang / 'phyang
phrul gyi sprin gyi char ni/ rab tu phab/ bdug spos rnam pa du ma'i sprin gyis ni/ kun tu bdugs/ lha rdzas kyi tsan+dan gyi phye ma dang / a ga ru'i phye ma dang / spos dam pa thams
cad kyi phye ma'i sprin gyi char ni/ rab tu phab/ lha'i bu mtha' yas pas kyang rang rang gi lus kyi sprin shin tu bkye/ dga' ldan gyi ris su gtogs pa'i lha'i bu bye ba brgya stong
phrag bcu dang / de ma yin pa'i lha'i ris nas 'dus pa'i lha'i bu rnams kyis kyang sems shin tu dang bas zhes rab tu bskyed nas shin tu btud de phyag
'tshal to/ /lha'i bu mo grangs med pa dag kyang dga' zhing mos pa'i sems kyis bcom ldan 'das la rab tu sems so/ /byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi gnas
na spyod pa grangs med pa rnams kyang bar snang la gnas te sangs rgyas la mchod par brtson pa'i sems kyis lha rdzas las 'das pa'i mchod pas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa
byed do| |rim gro byed do/ /phyag 'tshal lo/ /de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs dang / sangs rgyas kyi sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba rgyu mthun pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i
cho 'phrul bsam gyis mi khyab pas rol mo dkrol ba dang brdung ba'i tshogs grangs med pa yang sgra 'byin par gyur to/ /lha'i bu dga' ldan gyi gnas na 'khod pa dang /
lha'i bu mo rnams kyang bcom ldan 'das la ni/ blta/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung ba shin tu dkon par ni/ rjes su sems shing / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
rgyas ni/ rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa/ sgrib pa med pa'i chos can no/ /zhes yang dag par lta zhing / de logs su mngon par blta bar gyur to/ /dga' ldan
gyi gnas na 'khod pa'i 'khor thams cad dang / lha bye ba brgya stong grangs med pa bcom ldan 'das bsu ba'i phyir rin po che thams cad kyi me tog gi phur ma thogs thogs pa dang
spos thams cad kyi phur ma thogs thogs pa dang / rin po che thams cad kyi phur ma thogs thogs pa dang / rgyan thams cad kyi phur ma thogs thogs pa dang / lha rdzas kyi tsan+dan
thams cad kyi phye ma'i phur ma thogs thogs pa dang / lha rdzas kyi a ga ru thams cad kyi phye ma'i phur ma thogs thogs pa dang / lha rdzas kyi rin po che thams cad kyi phye ma'i phur
ma thogs thogs pa dang / lha rdzas kyi spos kyi me tog thams cad kyi phye ma'i phur ma thogs thogs pa dang / lha rdzas kyi me tog man+dA ra ba'i phur ma thogs thogs pa rnams kyang
dong ste bcom ldan 'das la gtor to/ /mngon par gtor to/ /rab tu gtor to/ /lha'i bu dga' ldan gyi gnas su gtogs pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med pa
rnams kyang bar snang la 'khod de/ ye shes kyi spyod yul la gzhol ba'i sems kyis spos dang / bdug pa'i sprin gyis bdugs pas bar snang brgyan par byas so/ /sangs
rgyas la dga' zhing gzhol ba'i sems kyis lha rdzas kyi me tog thams cad kyi sprin gyi char gyis rab tu brgyan pas bar snang brgyan par byas so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa la zhes
cher bya ba'i sems kyis lha rdzas kyi gdugs sna tshogs kyi sprin gyis bar snang g.yogs par byas te brgyan par byas so/ /sangs rgyas mchod
par gzhol ba'i sems kyis lha rdzas kyi phreng ba sna tshogs kyi sprin rab tu dgye bas bar snang brgyan par byas so/ /sangs rgyas las thos par mos pa'i sems kyis gser
gyi dra ba grangs med pa las dril bu sna tshogs kyi dra ba 'khrol zhing sgra 'byin pas yog par byas te bar snang brgyan par byas so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa la yon gyi gnas
dam pa yin par 'dzin pa'i sems kyis bla re grangs med pa las rin po che thams cad kyi sen mo do'i sprin lding zhing 'phrul pa'i rgyan gyis bar snang brgyan par byas so/ /
sangs rgyas la dge bar 'dun pa'i sems kyis lha rdzas kyi gzhal med khang grangs med par lha rdzas kyi rol mo brdungs pa dang / dkrol ba thams cad kyi sgra yid du 'ong ba
phyung bas bar snang brgyan par byas so/ /sangs rgyas skye ba shin tu dkon par dogs pa'i sems kyis lha rdzas kyi na bza' kha dog sna tshogs pa'i sprin dang / na bza'
mtshungs pa med pa'i sprin gyi char 'bab pa'i rgyan gyis bar snang brgyan par byas so/ /sangs rgyas la mos pa mtha' yas pa'i sems kyis lha rdzas kyi cod pan grangs
med pa'i sprin las cod pan gyi char chen po 'khor zhing 'bab pa'i rgyan gyis bar snang brgyan par byas so/ /sangs rgyas la yid bde ba skyes pa'i sems kyis lha rdzas kyi rin
po che kha dog sna tshogs grangs med pa'i sprin las phreng ba sna tshogs kyi char rgyun mi 'chad par 'bab pa'i rgyan gyis bar snang brgyan par byas so/ /lha'i bu bye ba brgya stong
grangs med pa yang lha rdzas kyi me tog kha dog tha dad pa grangs med pa lag na thogs te/ me tog zad mi shes pa'i mdzod rab tu bkye nas bcom ldan 'das la mngon par
gtor to/ /mos pa'i spos dri zhim po rnyed cing sangs rgyas la dad par gnas pas lha rdzas kyi spos dang / bdug pa kha dog sna tshogs grangs med pa lag na thogs te bcom ldan
'das la phul lo/ /rgyan chen po sprul pa'i sems kyis lha rdzas kyi tsan+dan gyi phye ma kha dog sna tshogs grangs med pa lag na thogs te bcom ldan 'das la mngon par gtor to//
dga' ba'i sems kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi zham 'bring du 'brang zhing rin po che'i gdugs kha dog sna tshogs grangs med pa lag na thogs te/ bcom ldan 'das la mngon
par 'gebs so/ /sangs rgyas mtha' yas pa la mos pa'i sems rnam par 'phel bas gos rin po che kha dog sna tshogs grangs med pa lag na thogs te bcom ldan 'das
gshegs pa'i lam gos kyis yog par byas so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa la rim gro bya bar mos pa'i sems kyis lha rdzas kyi rgyal mtshan rin po che
sna tshogs kyi kha dog can lag na thogs shing bcom ldan 'das kyi zham ring du 'dong ngo / /sangs rgyas la dga' ba mtha' yas pa rnam par 'phel ba'i sems kyis lha rdzas kyi
lhab lhub dang / 'phyang phrul kha dog sna tshogs grangs med pa'i yang grangs med pa lag na thogs te de bzhin gshegs pa la phul lo/ /dad pa mi 'phrog pa'i sems kyis
lha rdzas kyi phreng ba grangs med pa lag na thogs te bcom ldan 'das la mngon par gtor to/ /mtshungs pa med pa'i dga' ba rnam par 'phel bas/ lha rdzas kyi ba dan rin
po che kha dog sna tshogs grangs med pa'i yang grangs med pa lag na thogs te bcom ldan 'das kyi drung na 'dzin to/ /lha'i bu bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med pa yang zhi ba
la rab tu gzhol zhing bag yod pa tshad med pa'i sems kyis lha rdzas kyi rol mo brdung ba dang / dkrol ba kha dog sna tshogs grangs med pa lag na thogs te yid du 'ong ba'i
sgra dbyangs phyung nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes par byed do/ /byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong brjod du med pa dga' ldan gyi gnas nas 'ongs pa rnams
kyang lha rdzas las 'das pa'i mchod pa/ khams gsum las rnam par 'das pa/ dmigs pa'i chos las byung ba/ rjen pa'i dri med pa/ chags pa med pa'i sems tshim par byed pa/ chos
kyi tshul zab mos mngon par grub pa/ blo tshad med par yangs pa las byung ba/ dad pa'i rtsa ba brtan pas rnam par spel ba/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa las byung ba/ dge ba'i
rtsa ba dang / 'phrul pa grangs med pas mngon par bsgrubs pa/ sangs rgyas kyi mchod pa yid kyi rang bzhin las byung ba/ mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i chos kyi sgo'i rgyas btab
pas chos kyi dbyings thams cad kun nas yog par byas so/ /lha rdzas las 'das pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba'i me tog gi bla re sna tshogs kyis chos kyi dbyings kun nas
khebs par byas so/ /lha rdzas las 'das pa mos pas rnam par dag pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yul rgyas par 'gengs pa'i na bza' sna tshogs mngon par dgab pas chos kyi
dbyings brgyan par byas so/ /chags pa med pa'i chos kyi rang bzhin rdo rje la yang dag par zhugs pa'i sems kyis lha rdzas las 'das pa mi skye ba'i chos las byung ba'i dril bu
tshom bur bcad pa'i dra bas chos kyi dbyings brgyan par byas so/ /chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bur rtogs pa'i sems kyis lha rdzas las 'das pa'i spos thams cad kyi mchog
gi bdug pa'i rgyan gyis chos kyi dbyings brgyan par byas so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs pas chos kyi dbyings rgyas par bya ba'i sems kyis
lha rdzas las 'das pa'i rin po che thams cad kyi khri sangs rgyas kyi gdan du bting ba'i rgyan gyis chos kyi dbyings brgyan par byas so/ /sangs rgyas kyi mchod pa rang bzhin 'gag
pa med pa'i sems kyis lha rdzas las 'das pa'i rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan yang dag par bsgrengs pa'i rgyan gyis chos kyi dbyings brgyan par byas so/ /rmi lam lta bu'i
chos nyid kyis bsam pa tshim pas lha rdzas las 'das pa'i rin po che sna tshogs kyis sangs rgyas kyi pho brang brgyan pas chos kyi dbyings brgyan par byas so/ /mi gnas pa'i
dge ba'i rtsa ba blang ba med pa las byung bas lha rdzas las 'das pa'i rin po che sna tshogs kyi pad+mos kun nas yog pa'i rgyan gyis chos kyi dbyings brgyan par byas so/ /lha rdzas
las 'das pa'i spos thams cad kyi mchog gi sprin gyis chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par bya ba dang / me tog kha dog mtha' yas pa sna tshogs kyi sprin dang / na bza'
kha dog sna tshogs rnam pa tha dad pa thams cad kyi sprin dang / tsan+dan gyi dri zhim po mtha' yas par 'phro ba thams cad kyi sprin dang / lha rdzas las 'das pa'i rin po che
thams cad kyi gdugs rnam pa sna tshogs kyi sprin dang / spos dang bdug pa sna tshogs kyi ngad kun tu ldang ba'i sprin dang / phreng ba yid du 'ong ba thams cad kyi sprin dang / lha rdzas las
'das pa'i lhab lhub rnam par dag pa thams cad kyi sprin dang / byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong brjod du med pa rang gi lus gtong ba'i sprin dang / sangs rgyas kyi
yon tan brjod pa las 'das pas bstod cing bsngags pa'i brjod pa zad mi shes pa'i sprin dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstod pas brjod pa ji lta ba bzhin du yang dag par
bsngags pa'i chos ma log pa byung ba/ sangs rgyas kyi stobs mtha' dang dbus med pa las rgyu bas 'gro ba thams cad bde ba'i lam bstan pa dang / tshig rnam par 'byed pa
brjod du med pa smos pas chos tshad med pa la gzhol ba'i gzungs kyi rgyud thams cad las byung ba'i tha dad pa yang dag par shes pa la mkhas pa/ mi zad pa dang mi 'jigs
pas yid dga' bar gyur pa'i rim gro ngom mi shes pas de bzhin gshegs pa la mngon par bstod pa/ tshig rnam par dbye zhing brjod pas byang chub sems dpa' de dag
chos kyi dbyings kyi lus nam mkha'i khams rgyas par byed pa byin gyis brlabs te/ sangs rgyas 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba thams cad kyis yongs su
bzung ba'i yid kyi dbang pos mngon par bstod do/ /lha'i ris gzhan dang gzhan nas 'dus pa'i 'khor de dag thams cad dang / sangs rgyas kyi
zhing brjod du med pa nas 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor rnams kyang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi khyu mchog gi mthu
phyung ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa yongs su ston cing / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku yang dag par 'byung ba dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rdzu 'phrul yang dag par ston pa dang /
sems can grangs med pa'i rgyud tshim par mdzad pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi rgyan rnam par phye bas nam mkha'i khams thams cad dang / chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par
mdzad pa/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba mtha' yas pa brtan par mdzad pa/ sangs rgyas kyi cho 'phrul gzhal du med pa las byung ba/ tshig gi lam thams cad las yang
dag par 'das pa/ byang chub sems dpa' rigs dang ldan pa thams cad kyis mngon par mos par bya ba/ sems can 'dul ba ji lta ba bzhin du tshim par bya ba'i phyir sangs
rgyas kyi sku yangs pa rjes su khyab par gyur pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba brjod pa thams cad rnam par dag pas sangs rgyas kyi yon tan tshad med pa yang dag par ston pa/ de bzhin
gshegs pa'i yul rgyun mi 'chad par 'byung ba'i sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin las byung ba/ 'gro ba thams cad ma lus pa'i lus kyi rjes su bdal ba/ sku'i byin gyi rlabs las
mtshams med pa/ yid tshad med pa yongs su mgu bar mdzad pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rigs rgyun mi gcod pa/ sangs rgyas kyi rnam par spyod pa mtha' dang dbus med
pa 'byung ba brnyes pa/ 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rigs su byung ba/ khams dang / mos pa bgrang du med pa thams cad sbyong bar mdzad
pa| byang chub sems dpa' thams cad ye shes mngon par sgrub pa la 'jug par mdzad pa/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi dbang po rab tu dga' bar mdzad pa/ chos kyi sprin
gyis nam mkha'i khams thams cad du yog par mdzad pa/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad ma lus par de bzhin gshegs pas 'dul ba'i byin gyi rlabs kyis rlob pa/ sems can
thams cad kyi rtog pa bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su rgyas par mdzad pa/ mi gnas pa'i ye shes kyi rgyud kyis 'gro ba thams cad las 'phags pa/ ye shes kyi rnam pa thams
cad brnyes pa/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs snang ba gzigs pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba ji ltar bskyed pa bzhin du yang dag par gzigs pa/ sems bskyed pa rgya chen po skye bar mdzad
pa| 'gro ba thams cad kun tu bzang po thub pa med pa'i ye shes yang dag par rgyu bas byung ba/ 'gro ba dang / zhing thams cad du khyab pa/ chos kyi dbyings
thams cad du mi ldog par gshegs pa/ sangs rgyas kyi sku'i rgyud brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa yang dag par ston pa/ bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'khrul pa mi
mnga' bar byin gyis rlob pa/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi tshig gi rnam pas yon tan mi zad pa/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pas chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par mdzad
pa| 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' dang dbus med par khyab par mdzad pa/ byang chub kyi sems kyis ji ltar dam bcas pa'i sems can rim gror mdzad pa/ ji ltar brnyes
pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa mdzad pa/ sems can ji ltar 'dul ba bzhin du 'dul bar mdzad pa/ mos pa dang bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par dag par mdzad pa/ gzugs
kyi sku bsam gyis mi khyab par byin gyis rlob pa/ 'gro ba thams cad la gnas pa mi mnga' zhing mnyam pa nyid kyi rjes su bzhud pa/ spyod pa tha dad pa las byung ba/ de bzhin
gshegs pa'i stobs bcu bsgribs pa med pa/ mngon par sangs rgyas pa/ thugs la chags pa mi mnga' bas rtag tu mnyam par bzhag cing ma 'dres pa/ ye shes
thams cad la rnam par spyod pa/ don dang tshig dang yi ge la dad pa yang dag par ston pa/ ye shes rgya mtsho mtha' dang dbus med pa la bzhugs pa/ yon tan gyi mchog ye shes
kyi snying pos byung bas chos kyi dbyings thams cad du sangs rgyas kyi nyi ma shar ba/ 'gro ba thams cad du sngon gyi smon lam zad pa mi mnga' bar chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin la
gnas pa/ sangs rgyas kyi rnam par spyod pa ma nyams pa brnyes pa/ bdag gi dang yongs su gzung ba med pas gnas pa mi mnga' ba/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos thams cad
'byung zhing / 'jig rten gyi chos thams cad kyis ma gos pa/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi mi shes pa'i rgyal mtshan yang dag par bcad pa/ 'jig rten thams cad kyi mi shes pa chen
po yongs su bsal ba'i gnas su gyur pa/ 'gro ba thams cad snang bar mngon par 'don pa/ 'jig rten thams cad ye shes khyad par du 'phags pa la rab tu gzhog pa/
'gro ba thams cad nye bar 'tsho ba'i bsod nams yongs su mi zad pa/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi shes pa thugs su chud pas dad par bya bar 'os pa/ yang dag par
rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su gzhol ba'i byams pa chen po las byung ba/ thugs rje chen po yang dag par ston pas spyod pa/ sangs rgyas kyi sku brjod du med pa'i chos dang / sangs
rgyas kyi chos sna tshogs bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i gsung dang dbyangs kyi char 'bebs pa/ sems can gyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du yang dag par
tshim par mdzad pa/ sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dang / da ltar byung ba'i mtha' dmigs pa'i byin rlabs shin tu dag cing bsam gyis mi khyab pas sems can dag
par mdzad pa| byang chub sems dpa' thams cad lung bstan pa rgyun mi 'chad pa/ sangs rgyas kyi rigs su dbang bskur bas de bzhin gshegs pa'i rgyud du byung ba/
'jig rten thams cad du 'khor lo mi ldog par 'khor ba/ 'jig rten thams cad kyi mngon par zhen pa thams cad las 'phags pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing dang / chos
kyi dbyings thams cad kyi mtha' klas pa la mi gnas pa/ 'gro ba thams cad mnyam pa nyid du thugs su chud pa/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bsod nams kyis rnam par
dag pa| 'khor ba la mi bzhugs par 'jig rten thams cad du snang bar gyur pa/ btsal ba mi dmigs pas chos kyi dbyings thams cad kyi rang bzhin/ ye shes kyi zla ba
de bzhin gshegs pa tshad med pa'i rjes su bzhud pa/ sgyu ma lta bu'i ye shes kyis byin gyis rlob pa/ mig yor lta bu'i ye shes kyis rnam par ston pa/ rmi lam lta bur
rjes su dran pa/ sprul pa dang mnyam par byung ba/ sems kyi rang bzhin lta bur 'jig rten sna tshogs thams cad byin gyis rlob pa/ las kyi rnam par smin pa'i tshul dang / bsam pa
ji lta ba bzhin du sems can gyi skye mched rnam par phye ba yang dag par ston pa/ sems can gyi dbang po dang mthun par sangs rgyas kyi sku byung ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i dmigs
pa la sems can grangs med pa'i sems yang dag par gnas pa/ 'jig rten thams cad rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba rnam par bsten pa'i rang bzhin du chos kyi mtshan nyid
kyis yang dag par spyod pa/ ye shes kyi rgyud mtshan nyid med pa'i rang bzhin dang mtshan nyid gcig tu gyur pa/ 'jig rten thams cad kyi rang bzhin gyi mtshan nyid snang ba mngon
par sgrub pa'i spyod pa yang dag par ston cing / 'gro ba thams cad gdon par brtson pa/ sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul bla na med pa yang dag par ston pa/ 'jig rten dang zhing thams
cad yongs su skyob pas sangs rgyas kyi mtshan ma gzung bar 'jig rten du mngon par byung ba/ 'jig rten gyi nyon mongs pa'i mtshan ma thams cad rnam par bsal ba/ 'jig rten
thams cad kyi rjes su dran pa dang / dmigs par 'byor bar gyur pa/ 'khrug pa med par khong du chud par 'gyur ba'i rgyu theg pa chen pos zhal yongs su rgyas pa/ chos thams
cad kyi don grub pa/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa bas rnam par phye ba/ nyams pa med pa'i 'phrin las rnam par smin pas rnam par dag pa/ ye shes
kyi 'byung gnas dus gsum mnyam pa nyid du thugs su chud pa/ 'jig rten thams cad kyi yongs su rtog pa yongs su mi rtog pas byung ba/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad
du 'od zer gyi dra bas gsal bar gyur pa/ phyogs bcu 'byams klas pa thams cad du sangs rgyas kyi 'od kyis snang bar mdzad pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rjes su bzhud pa
blta bas mi ngoms shing btang mi bra ba/ yon tan chen po dang / ye shes dang / mngon par shes pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa 'byung ba dang / dbang po mngon par
mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi spyod yul can/ ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor gyis sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa rgyas par mdzad pa/ sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las shin tu sgrub pa nub cing / 'das
pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i tshul ston pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i gzungs mtha' yas pa'i char 'bebs pa/ bsam pa yangs pa'i
sgom pa yongs su 'dzin par mdzad pa/ sangs rgyas kyi dpal thams cad kyis rab tu 'bar ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku kha dog mtha' yas pa sna tshogs su 'jig
rten thams cad la mngon par ston pa/ sgrib pa'i chos thams cad du ma lhung ba/ chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin gyis don gyis dag pa/ yon tan gyi chos thams cad la mnga' bas
mdzes pa'i dkyil 'khor can/ yon tan gyi 'od zer mnga' ba'i nyi mar gyur pa/ bsod nams kyi zhing du shar ba/ gzi brjid thams cad kyi dra bas mngon par skyes pa/ 'jig
rten thams cad du sangs rgyas kyis sprul pa yang dag par 'dzin pa/ 'jig rten thams cad sprul par thugs su chud pa'i ye shes snang ba dang ldan pa/ de bzhin gshegs
pa'i go 'phang chags pa med pa mnga' ba/ phyi ma'i mtha'i yon tan 'jig rten thams cad kyis rnam par shes pa/ 'gro ba thams cad dang mthun par ston pa'i ye shes kyi phyag
mnga' ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi sman pa/ sems can thams cad bde bar mdzad pa/ 'jig rten tshad med pa thams cad du shin tu rnam par dag pas rjes
su 'brang ba/ 'gro ba dang zhing 'byams klas pa thams cad du phyir mi ldog pa/ ye shes kyi spyan phugs rab rib med cing rnam par dag pa/ sangs rgyas kyi lo legs pa
yang dag par ston pa/ 'khu ba'i sems can gyi khams las su rung bar mdzad pa/ 'dul ba sna tshogs du ma la 'jug pa/ dus bzhin du 'dul ba'i rgyun mi 'chad pa/
'gro ba thams cad la mnyam pa'i thugs kyis yang dag par spyod pa las skyon med pa'i rnam par smin pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa yang dag par
ston pa| bsam pa dang / las dang / rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu ji lta ba bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi sku rnam par ston pa/ sangs rgyas kyi sku ji lta ba bzhin du sems can gyis chos
shes pa 'byung bar mdzad pa/ sangs rgyas kyis sprul pa byin gyis rlob pa/ 'jig rten gyi chos thams cad la rnam par gzigs pa'i ye shes mnga' ba/ dga' ba chen po dang
lhag pa'i bsam pas dbang po dga' bar mdzad pa/ sangs rgyas mthong ba'i dad pa'i shugs mtha' yas pas byung ba/ sems can thams cad kyi rang gi dge ba'i rtsa ba phyir
mi ldog par mdzad pa/ sems can gyi las ji lta ba bzhin du rjes su 'brang bar mdzad pa/ 'gro ba gnyid kyis log pa thams cad sad par mdzad pa/ sangs rgyas skye bas
dge ba yang dag par 'phel bar mdzad pa/ sems can la sangs rgyas kyi bag dbab pa/ chen po stobs pa mdzad pa/ 'jig rten gyi lta ba thams cad la mi gnas
pa| ye shes kyi don la rab tu gzhog pa/ rab tu gzhag pa'i ye shes kyi tshul gyi spyod yul thugs su chud pa/ sangs rgyas kyis gzigs pa'i zil gyis non
pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ chos kyi rgyud thugs su chud pa'i ri bo rnam par dag pa/ sangs rgyas 'byams klas pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gzhan dang gzhan du ston pa/ kha na
ma tho ba med pa'i sa la sems can rab tu 'god pa/ sangs rgyas kyi yon tan grangs med pas rnam par bris pa/ las kyis sna tshogs su gyur pa'i 'jig rten du de bzhin gshegs
pa sna tshogs yang dag par ston pa/ sangs rgyas kyi 'byung gnas rnam par sbyong ba/ ye shes thams cad yongs su 'thob par mdzad pa/ 'jig rten thams cad kyi smon lam
rjes su srung ba/ mi shigs pa/ 'gro ba thams cad la dge ba'i bshes gnyen ston pa/ snang ba dri ma med cing mchog tu dag par mdzad pa/ 'gro ba ma lus pa thams cad
kyis ji tsam du mngon sum du mthong ba de tsam du brjod du med pa/ sems can thams cad kyi 'gro ba'i rjes su song ba'i byin gyi rlabs mnga' ba/ grogs sngon du 'gro ba'i
dge ba'i rtsa bas sems can rnam par dag par mdzad pa/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi smon lam gyi rjes su song ba/ nyams pa med pa/ sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i
rtsa ba yongs su bzung bas dag par mdzad pa las bsags pa'i tshul gyis yongs su byung ba/ bdud kyi dkrug ma thams cad rnam par 'joms par byung ba/ chags pa
med pa'i mtha'i stobs kyis byung ba/ 'gro ba thams cad kyis blta na 'od shin tu dang bar snang ba/ ye shes kyi dbyings chags pa med pa'i snying
po'i nyi ma sems can gang yang rung ba la chos kyi sbyin pa mdzad pa/ 'od zer gyi dkyil 'khor gyi mdzod mtha' dang dbus med pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs kyi
ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor mnga' ba/ 'gro ba thams cad la snang bar gyur pa/ bsam pa dang yang dag par rtogs pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa/ phyir rgol ba shin tu
bcom pa/ yon tan gyi gnas dam pa mchog tu gyur pa/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi rten du gyur pa/ yon tan tshad med par gyur pa/ 'gro ba thams cad yongs su dag par mdzad
pa| dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ngu tshad med par yongs su 'dzin pa/ zad mi shes pa'i ye shes kyi sar 'dzud cing rab tu gzhog pa/ 'jig rten thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba sems
la rag lus par yid ches pas tshad med pa'i bsod nams dang yon tan dag par mdzad pa/ ye shes kyi tshul gyis ngan song gsum gyi 'gro ba yongs su skyob pa'o/ /zhes
rnam pa de lta bur de bzhin gshegs pa la mos pa/ rnam pa de lta bur yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la yang dag par lta ba/ rnam pa de lta bur ye shes kyi mu stegs
las 'bab pa/ rnam pa de lta bu'i yon tan rgya mtsho'i gang chen mtsho thams cad la 'jug pa/ rnam pa de lta bu'i ye shes kyi nam mkha'i rjes su phyin par rjes su 'gro ba/ rnam
pa de lta bur 'gro ba thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing du yang dag pa ji lta bar shes pa/ rnam pa de lta bur de bzhin gshegs pa dran pa'i sgos lta ba/ rnam pa de lta bur
dge ba'i 'phrin las rnam par dag pa'i mtshan nyid phun sum tshogs pas de bzhin gshegs pa la rtog pa/ rnam pa de lta bu'i yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi
sku chen po 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du snang bar byed pa/ rnam pa de lta bu'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul ba thams cad yang dag par bstan
pa rjes su sems pa de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku bcom ldan 'das kyi ba spu'i sgo re re nas 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med pa 'byung ba/ grangs med
par rnam par dag pa/ grangs med par shin tu snang ba/ grangs med par bltar yod pa/ grangs med pa'i sems can gyi dga' ba skyed pa/ grangs med pa'i spro ba skyed
pa| grangs med pa'i sangs rgyas la 'dun pa rnam par 'phel bar byed pa/ grangs med pa'i lhag ba'i bsam pa rnam par sbyong ba/ grangs med pa'i dbang po sim par byed
pa| grangs med pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul thob par byed pa mang po mthong bar gyur to/ /'od kyi 'khor lo bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong
bsam gyis mi khyab pa yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku las rnam par 'phrul pa sna tshogs kyis 'phrul zhing 'byung ba/ kha dog bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ mdog bsam
gyis mi khyab pa/ 'od bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ chos kyi dbyings mtha' dang dbus med pa thams cad rgyas par byed pa/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs dang / sems can
rnam par dag pas dri zhim por rab tu byung ba/ tshigs su bcad pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong bsam gyis mi khyab pa yongs su 'dzin pa/ 'jig rten thams cad las rnam
par 'das shing / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dge ba'i rtsa bas yongs su byung ba/ rgyan bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ yang dag par ston pa/ bskal
pa bye ba khrag khrig bsam gyis mi khyab par yon tan mi zad pa/ sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa zad mi shes pa las byung ba/ sangs rgyas skye ba brjod du med pa
yang dag par ston pa/ ye shes kyi sgo la rab tu gzhog pa/ don yangs pa shin tu ston pa/ sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa brjod du med pa'i tshul yang dag par ston pa/
sangs rgyas kyi yul mtha' dang dbus med pa/ chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i khams kyi mthar thug pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du byin gyi rlabs kyis byung ba/
'gro ba thams cad rnam par dag pa/ mnyam pa nyid kyi rjes su song ba/ thams cad mkhyen pa chags pa med pa/ mtha' dang dbus med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa las byung
ba| de bzhin gshegs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pas bsten pa'i dpal yod pa/ rin po che'i 'od 'phro ba bye ba brgya stong bsam gyis mi khyab pa de ltar byung ba mthong bar gyur
to| |bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang byin gyi rlabs kyis rgyan smon lam chen po las byung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba mtha' yas pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa mnyes par bya ba'i
spyod pas rnam par dag pa dang / sngon gyi bag yod pa las yang dag par byung ba'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems chags pa med pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba las byung ba dang / de bzhin
gshegs pa 'byams klas pa 'gro ba thams cad kyi the tshom gcod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba la sems can tshad med pa rab tu dgod pa dang / dge ba'i
rtsa ba'i sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi cho 'phrul zil gyis non pa med pa la rgya mtsho'i mthas gtugs pa'i sems can gzud par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' bka' bzhin
byed pa thams cad sangs rgyas kyi zhing kun nas 'dus pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa
yongs su brjod pa'i tshul gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor du ji ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'byams klas pa khrag khrig brgya stong brjod du med pa grangs med pa dag na sems
ma dad pa rnams dad par bya ba dang / sems dad pa rnams rnam par 'phel bar bya ba dang / sems rnam par 'phel ba rnams rnam par dag par bya ba dang / sems rnam
par dag pa rnams yongs su smin par bya ba dang / sems yongs su smin pa rnams 'dul bar bya ba dang / chos zab mo khong du chud par bya ba dang / ye shes snang ba mtha'
dang dbus med pa khong du chud par bya ba dang / sems tshad med pa rnams rgya che bar bya ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa las phyir mi ldog par bya ba dang /
chos nyid dang mi 'gal bar bya ba dang / yang dag pa'i mthas mi skrag par bya ba dang / de bzhin nyid rab tu rtogs par bya ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyang rab tu rdzogs
par bya ba dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par sbyang bar bya ba dang / dmigs pa thams cad la brtson pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa yang kun tu
bzang po'i tshul du mos par bya ba dang / bdud kyi yul las rnam par ldog par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi yul 'thob par bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid shes par bya ba
dang / ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa skye bar bya ba dang / theg pa chen po'i smon lam las phyir mi ldog par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas blta ba las mi 'phang bar bya ba dang / ye shes khong
du chud par bya ba tshad med pa rtogs par bya ba dang / sa mtshams med pa'i bsod nams kyi stobs yang dag par yongs su bsgrub par bya ba dang / shin tu dga' ba'i sems bskyed
par bya ba dang / the tshom med pa'i sa la 'jug par bya ba dang / kha na ma tho ba med cing yongs su dag pa 'thob par bya ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la brten pa so sor thob
par bya ba dang / chos mthong ba las phyir mi ldog par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi tshogs kyi rjes su 'jug par bya ba dang / dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams
cad kyi rigs grub par bya ba de lta de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs rje chen po kun tu khyab pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi phung po chen pos byin gyi rlabs kyi
rgyan rnam pa tha dad pa mang po yang dag par bstan to/ /de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis sems can thams cad 'dul ba'i dbang du sangs rgyas kyi bdag nyid che ba brjod pa'i
phyir chags pa med pa'i ye shes kyi snying po rab tu snang bas sangs rgyas kyi dpal mtha' yas pa rab tu 'bar ba/ sangs rgyas kyi cho 'phrul bsam gyis mi
khyab pas rnam par snang ba thams cad du bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i skus rnam par 'phrul pa mtha' dang dbus med pa'i cho 'phrul gyi mthu dang ldan pa/ dgongs pa
yongs su rdzogs pa'i sngon gyi smon lam gyis yongs su grub pa'i ye shes kyi rnam par gnon pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i gshegs stabs phun sum tshogs pa/ chos kyi dbang
phyug brnyes pas chos thams cad la mnga' ba dang ldan pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sgo nas byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rnam par dag pas shin tu sbyangs pa mnga'
ba| 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam pa nyid du gyur pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyis snying po shin tu sbyangs pa/ 'gro ba
thams cad kyi dpes dper mi 'gyur ba'i sku gzugs mnga' ba/ mtshan thams cad kyi lo ma shin tu 'phags pa'i sku can/ stobs bcu'i rgyal mtshan gyi stobs chen po dang
ldan pa| bskal pa mi zad pa thams cad du blta bas mi ngom pa/ sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba ston pa'i dbyangs kyis ye shes kyi nga ror gyur pa/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad
kyi dkyil 'khor mi zad pas 'gro ba thams cad la nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor du gyur pa/ yon tan thams cad kyi rgyal po chos thams cad kyi srid la mnga' ba'i phyir dus gsum snang bar byed
pa'i gsung mnga' bas byin gyi rlabs kyi rgyan sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs las yang dag par byung ba'i byin gyis brlabs so/ /de nas lha'i rgyal po rab dga' ldan gyis tshul 'di lta
bur de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa dang / rim gro dang / rgyan kun tu bshams pa byas te dga' ldan gyi ris kyi lha bye ba brgya stong grangs med pa dang lhan cig tu zhes can rim gro
dang bcas par bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der thal mo sbyar te phyag 'tshal nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gshegs su gsol/ bde bar
gshegs pa/ gshegs su gsol/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bde bar gshegs sam/ de nas bcom ldan 'das lha'i rgyal po
rab dga' ldan gyis spyan drangs nas sangs rgyas kyi rgyan rnam pa 'di lta bu dang / sangs rgyas kyi bdag nyid che ba 'gro ba thams cad la mdzes pa/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad
mos pa/ dga' ldan gyi ris kyi lha'i bu thams cad mngon par dga' ba/ lha'i rgyal po rab dga' ldan gyis mi ngoms par rim gror bya zhing / tshad med pa'i sems can sangs
rgyas la dmigs par brtson pa bskyed pa/ tshad med pa'i sems can sangs rgyas su dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa/ mi zad pa'i bsod nams dang ldan par
gyur pa| dad pa dri ma med pa'i tshogs kyis bsags pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhal blta ba dang / mchod pas skyo bar mi 'gyur ba/ lhag pa'i bsam pa dge ba'i tshogs kyis
yang dag par bsdus pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / smon lam dang / sems bskyed pa las byung bas khang pa rin po che thams cad kyis brgyan par gshegs
so| |ji ltar bcom ldan 'das 'dir gshegs pa de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi gling bzhi pa dang / dga' ldan gyi gnas dag tu yang gshegs par snang
ngo / /bcom ldan 'das rin po che thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i khang par gshegs ma thag tu de'i tshe rin po che thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i khang pa rin po che'i rgyan las shin tu
'das par gnas so/ /lha rdzas las 'das pa'i rin po che thams cad kyi dra bas kun nas yog par gnas so/ /lha rdzas las 'das pa'i rin po che thams cad kyi sprin gyi char
mngon par 'bab par gnas so/ /lha rdzas las 'das pa'i rin po che thams cad kyi rgyan gyi sprin gyis brgyan par gnas so/ /lha rdzas las 'das pa'i gos thams cad kyi
sprin rab tu gtong bar gnas so/ /lha rdzas las 'das pa'i tsan+dan thams cad kyi sprin chen po rab tu gtong bar gnas so/ /lha rdzas las 'das pa'i dri thams cad kyi mchog
dang / bdug pa 'thul ba'i sprin gyi char rab tu 'bab par gnas so/ /lha rdzas las 'das pa'i rin po che sna tshogs thams cad kyi sprin rnam pa tha dad pa'i char rab tu 'bab
par gnas so/ /lha rdzas las 'das pa'i me tog mang po'i sprin gyi tshogs kyi char rab tu 'bab par gnas so/ /lha rdzas las 'das pa'i sil snyan dang / brdung ba bye ba brgya
stong bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i sgra rab tu 'byin par gnas so/ /thams cad mkhyen pa'i chos kyi dbyings su grag pa'i rol mo'i sgra dang / glu'i dbyangs kyang rab tu 'gyed par
gnas par gyur te/ ji ltar bcom ldan 'das gshegs pa de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi gling bzhi pa dang / dga' ldan gyi gnas dag tu'ang rin po
che thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i khang par gshegs par snang ngo / /de nas lha'i rgyal po rab dga' ldan gyis lha'i gnas thams cad du lha'i rgyal po rab dga' ldan gyis
de bzhin gshegs pa la gsol ba btab bo/ /zhes sgra brjod do/ /de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus lha'i rgyal po rab dga' ldan la bar chad du mi 'gyur ba dang / sngon gyi
dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs dang / tshad med pa'i dge ba'i rtsa bas brtan pa dang / mtha' yas par sems bskyed pa'i dad pa rnam par 'phel ba dang /
shugs chen po yang dag par bskyed pa dang / dga' ba chen po shin tu bskyed pa dang / dge ba'i bsam pa rnam par sbyangs pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed
pas dga' bar bya ba dang / chos la bar chad med pa'i yid du 'gyur bar bya ba dang / chos rnams mi nyams par bya ba'i phyir dga' ldan gyi gnas kyi glu dang / rol mo
brdung ba dang / dkrol ba'i sgra rgyun mi 'chad par gyur to/ /de nas lha'i rgyal po rab dga' ldan gyis sangs rgyas kyi mthus sngon gyi yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
rnams la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa de dag rjes su dran nas de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis/ /chags pa med pa'i zla bar
mtshan gsol mtshan btags pa/ /pho brang mchog tu rab gshegs pa/ /des ni 'di yang bkra shis legs gyur cig /bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis/ /ye shes
mtha' yas dbang zhes bya bar mtshan btags pa/ /kha dog gser du rab gshegs pa/ /des ni 'dir yang bkra shis legs gyur cig/ bkra shis dam pa gang zhig
gis| |kun tu mtha' yas spyan zhes bya bar mtshan btags pa/ /pad+mo'i rtse mor rab gshegs pa/ /des ni 'dir yang bkra shis legs gyur cig /bkra shis dam pa gang zhig
gis| |yan lag rin po che zhes bya bar mtshan btags pa/ /rin chen mdzod du rab gshegs pa/ /des ni 'dir yang bkra shis legs gyur cig /bkra shis dam pa gang zhig
gis| |dpal rab rgol ba'i stag ces bya bar mtshan btags pa/ /dbang po'i khang par rab gshegs pa/ /des ni 'dir yang bkra shis legs gyur cig /bkra shis dam pa
gang zhig gis/ /yon tan thams cad ston pa'i nyin mtshan btags pa/ /me tog snying por rab gshegs pa/ /des ni 'dir yang bkra shis legs gyur cig/ bkra
shis dam pa gang zhig gis/ /yan lag 'od zer mtha' yas par ni mtshan btags pa/ /shing gis brgyan par rab gshegs pa/ /des ni 'dir yang bkra shis legs
gyur cig/ bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis/ /mgon po the tshom 'joms pa chos kyi rgyal mtshan de/ /rin chen khang par rab gshegs pa/ /des ni 'dir yang bkra shis
legs gyur cig /bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis/ /mi yi seng+ge ye shes sgron ma mtha' yas pa/ /spos kyi rtse mor rab gshegs pa/ /des ni 'dir yang bkra shis
legs gyur cig /bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis/ /sangs rgyas yon tan kun gyi 'byung gnas 'od mnga' ba/ /nor bus brgyan par rab
gshegs pa/ /des ni 'dir yang bkra shis legs gyur cig /ji ltar lha'i rgyal po rab dga' ldan gyis sangs rgyas kyi mthus sngon gyi yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
sangs rgyas rnams kyi yon tan brjod de glu'i dbyangs su tshigs su bcad pas rgyal ba gshegs pa mngon par bstod pa de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na
yang lha'i rgyal po rab dga' ldan rnams sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis glu'i dbyangs su tshigs su bcad cing / sngon gyi yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams
kyi yon tan rjod par byed cing / rgyal ba gshegs pa la yang mngon par bstod par gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das chos kyi sku shin tu rnam par dag pa'i sku dang /
'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad dang rigs gcig tu gyur pas rnam par 'phrul pa dang / rgyud kyi tshul
gcig tu gyur bas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rjes su thugs su chud pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang / chos thams cad la bsgribs pa med par khyab pa'i sangs rgyas
kyi spyan dang / chos kyi dbyings mtha' dang dbus med pa thams cad du sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs rgyun mi 'chad pa dang / sems can 'dul ba ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su khyab pa'i
sangs rgyas kyi cho 'phrul dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku bsgribs pa med pa'i rgyan gyis yang dag par brgyan pa dang / dus bzhin du byung ba'i chos bstan pa/ byang chub sems
dpa' brjod du med pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing sna tshogs nas lhags pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i skus yang dag par spyod pa/ gnyis
su med pa'i chos kyi sku la gnas pa'i sangs rgyas khyu mchog gi mthu phyung bas/ rin po che thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i khang par gshegs nas gdan bting ba la skyil mo krung bcas
te bzhugs so/ /ji ltar bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du yang bzhugs par gyur te/ ji ltar bcom ldan 'das rin po che thams
cad kyis brgyan pa'i khang par gshegs pa dang / byon pa'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi rim gro dang / mchod pa byas shing rgyan gyis brgyan pa de dag thams cad pas/ de bzhin gshegs
pa gdan de la bzhugs pa'i tshe grangs med pa'i yang grangs med pa'i rnam par lha rdzas las 'das pa'i me tog dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / spos dang / phye ma dang / na bza'
dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / rin po che dang / rol mo brdung pa dang / dkrol ba dang / glu dang / bstod pa dang / rje sa dang / rim gro dang /
dad pa dang / dga' ba dang / thal mo sbyar ba dang / lha rdzas las 'das pa rnam pa grangs med pa'i rgyan dang / lha rdzas las 'das pa rnam pa grangs med pa'i bstod pa dang / lha rdzas
las 'das pa rnam pa grangs med pa'i sprin gyi char 'bab pa dang / lha rdzas las 'das pa rnam pa grangs med pa'i gdugs gcig nas gcig tu brgyud de bsgreng ba dang / lha
rdzas las 'das pa rnam pa grangs med pa'i rgyal mtshan la ba dan dpyangs pa dang / shin tu dpyangs pa grangs med pas sbyar ba/ lha rdzas las 'das pa'i yo byad kyi tshul dang
bsam pa rgya chen po rnam par 'phel bas sangs rgyas mnyes par bya ba dang / mdzes pa'i rgyan rnam par dag par thams cad kyi rin po che'i dri thams cad dang / phyogs
brgyan pa'i spos kyi sprin chen po dang / rim gro'i rnam pa sna tshogs rgya che zhing yid du 'ong bas sangs rgyas la mchod pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rim gro
la brtson pas de bzhin gshegs pa gdan la bzhugs pa'i tshe grangs med pa'i rgyun du mchod pa byas so/ /de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi dga' ldan
gyi gnas dag tu yang mchod pa byas par gyur to/ /shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba las/ de bzhin gshegs pa dga' ldan du bzhud pa
dang / gshegs pa dang / bzhugs pa'i rgyan ces bya ba'i le'u ste/ nyi shu brgyad pa'o// //bam po sum cu gcig pa/ de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus phyogs
bcu kun nas byang chub sems dpa' bcu mngon par lhags te/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag so so nas 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong phrag bcu'i rdul shin
tu phra ba snyed kyi pha rol nas 'ongs par gyur pa dag ste/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag re re zhing yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi byang chub
sems dpa' dag dang lhan cig tu phyin to/ /byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang ming 'di zhes bya ba dag ste/ 'di ltar rdo rje'i rgyal mtshan dang / dam pa'i rgyal
mtshan dang / dpa' ba'i rgyal mtshan dang / skar ma'i rgyal mtshan dang / ye shes kyi rgyal mtshan dang / rin po che'i rgyal mtshan dang / rdul dang bral ba'i rgyal mtshan
dang / dri ma med pa'i rgyal mtshan dang / dpal gyi rgyal mtshan dang / chos kyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba dag go /byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang 'jig rten
gyi khams ming 'di zhes bya ba dag nas 'ongs par gyur pa dag ste/ 'di ltar rin po che'i snying po dang / yid du 'ong ba'i snying po dang / dngul gyi snying po dang /

gser gyi snying po dang / nor bu'i snying po dang / rdo rje'i snying po dang / pad+mo'i snying po dang / ut+pa la'i snying po dang / tsan+dan gyi snying po dang / spos kyi snying po zhes bya ba dag go /
byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan 'di zhes bya ba dag gi zham 'bring na tshangs par spyod pa dag ste/ 'di ltar shin tu 'phags
pa'i dpal dang / g.yo ba med pa'i dpal dang / bcings pa med pa'i dpal dang / spyod pa'i dpal dang / 'od zer gyi dpal dang / mtha' las rgal ba'i dpal dang / mchog
gi dpal dang / dbang phyug gi dpal dang / tshangs pa'i dpal dang / shin tu bsags pa'i dpal zhes bya ba dag go /de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag bcom ldan
'das la phyag 'tshal nas phyogs bcu rgyas par byas te/ gang nas 'ongs pa'i phyogs su brten nas seng+ge'i khri rin po che'i snying po can/ nor bu sna tshogs dang ldan pa
dag mngon par sprul te gser gyi dra bas g.yogs pa'i lus dang / 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med pa gtong pa dang / dri ma med pa'i 'od gtong pa
dang / tshad med pa'i 'od rab tu bskyed pa dang / bsam pa rnam par dag pa'i rin po che yang dag par 'dzin pa'i gzugs dang / byang chub sems dpa'i bsam pa kha na ma tho
ba med pa las byung ba'i smon lam dang / 'gro ba thams cad kyis blta na yid du 'ong ba dang / blta na don yod par sems can gdul ba dang / rnam par dag pa'i chos kyis
sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa yongs su ston pa dang / 'gro ba thams cad yongs su bskyab par byang chub sems dpa'i rtse gcig tu smon lam btab pas skyil mo krung
bcas te 'khod do/ /byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang 'di lta ste/ chags pa med par spyod pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du 'gro ba dang / 'di lta ste/
gnas pa med pa'i lus dang / 'di lta ste/ tshad med pa'i lus kyis kun tu 'gro ba'i ye shes kyi lus kyi byin gyi rlabs dang / 'di lta ste/ mtha' dang dbus med pa'i sangs
rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa la 'jug pa dang / 'di lta ste/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i sgo 'byams klas pa tshad med par gyur pa dang / 'di lta ste/ chos
la mi 'jigs par mkhas pa'i snang ba mtha' yas pa dang / 'di lta ste/ phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal par mi zad pa'i tha dad pa yang dag par shes pa'i tshul bshad pa dang /
'di lta ste/ gzugs thams cad kyis snang bar byas pa'i ye shes kyi phung bo rab tu rgyas pa dang / 'di lta ste/ chos kyi dbyings rgyas par gyur pa'i shes
rab kyi mig rnam par dag pa'i spobs pa dang / 'di lta ste/ nam mkha'i dbyings kyis klas par ye shes kyi spyod yul yongs su gnas pa dang / mtshams med cing mtha'
yas pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyod pa dang ldan pa rab tu thob par gyur pa dag go/ ji ltar gling bzhi pa 'di'i dga' ldan gyi gnas su byang chub sems dpa' 'dus
pa gyur pa de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi gling bzhi pa dang / dga' ldan gyi gnas dag tu yang byang chub sems dpa' ming de skad ces bya ba dag 'jig
rten gyi khams ming de skad ces bya ba dag nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan de skad ces bya ba dag gi zham ring na tshangs par spyod pa sha stag 'ongs par gyur to/ /
de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs pus mo'i lha nga gnyis nas 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong byung ste/ phyogs bcu thams cad snang bar byas nas 'jig rten
gyi khams thams cad bstan to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams de dag gi gling bzhi pa thams cad dang / dga' ldan gyi
gnas thams cad na de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa yod par mthong bar gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa' de dag ji snyed kyis phyogs bcur chos kyi dbyings
kyis klas pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi mthar thug pa dag na de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par rol pa mthong bar gyur pa de dag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad kyi sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la dge ba'i rtsa ba'i grogs su gyur pa dag ste/ 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi rnam
par thar pa zab mos rnam par 'phrul ba la mos pa sha stag go/ chos kyi dbyings kyi lus tha dad pa med pa'i rjes su song ba sha stag go/ gnas med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi
zhing du 'gro ba'i rjes su song bas rab tu zhugs pa sha stag go /sangs rgyas bsam gyis mi khyab pa lta ba la rjes su gzhol ba sha stag go /chags pa med pa'i sems
skad cig gis chos kyi dbyings khyab par byed pa sha stag go /bsam pa rin po che rdul dang bral ba dang ldan pa sha stag go /brjod du med pa'i sangs rgyas mang po dang
'grogs pa dang ldan pa sha stag go /sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs grangs med pa dang ldan pa sha stag go/ yang dag pa spyod pa'i mchog gi pha rol tu phyin pa sha
stag go /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi dran pa rnam par dag pa la gnas pa sha stag go / blo dang sems skad cig thams
cad kyis cher 'phags pa rab tu thob pa sha stag go /chung ngur zhugs shing cher gyur pa'i spyod pa la dbang ba sha stag go / cher gyur pa la zhugs shing chung ngur 'jug
pa'i rjes su chud nas ye shes kyi spyod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sha stag go /de lta bu'i gnas dang / sangs rgyas kyi sku'i rang bzhin rjes su rtogs pa dang / de bzhin
gshegs pa dang 'grogs shing thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / rin po che sna tshogs ltar grub pa'i lus dang / de bzhin
gshegs par gyur pa'i spyod yul thams cad du 'gro ba dang / ye shes chen po'i rgyud kyi sgo rnam par phye ba dang / ye shes kyi stobs rdo rje'i rgyal mtshan gyi mthu'i
mchog thob pa dang / rdo rje gcod pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi tshul rab tu thob pa dang / sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med pa rnams yongs su smin par
gdul ba la rmongs pa med pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul ba thams cad du 'gro ba gdon mi za ba'i mchog thob pa dang / bgrang ba thams cad la mngon
par ma chags pa dang / bgrang ba mngon par sgrub pa thams cad shin tu bslab pa dang / bgrang ba'i shes pa thams cad kyis mthar thug cing chos rnam par dgod pa la
mkhas pa 'di dag dang / gzhan yang yon tan bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong brjod du med pa/ yon tan bsngags pa rnam par dag pa mi zad pas byang chub sems dpa'
rnams kyi dus gsum gyi yon tan tshad med pa dang ldan pa sha stag de bzhin gshegs pa mngon sum du bya ba dang / sangs rgyas 'byams klas pa thams cad blta ba'i phyir
kun nas 'dus par gyur to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i rgyal mtshan gyis sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te de'i tshe tshigs su
bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /yang dag sangs rgyas skye ba med/ /rgyal ba mya ngan mi 'da' ste/ /rgyu mthun pa yi smon lam gyis/ /des ni rnam par 'phrul pa snang / /'di dag
chos ni bsam mi khyab/ /'di dag sems kyi spyod yul min/ /gang gis ye shes pha rol phyin/ /des ni sangs rgyas spyod yul mthong / /lus 'di yang dag sangs rgyas
min| |sgra yang de bzhin gshegs pa min/ /lus dang sgra las gzhan na yang / /sangs rgyas rnam par 'phrul mi mthong / /sngon gyi las rnams ma gtogs par/ /rang
byung rnams kyi spyod yul gyi/ /mchog gi tshul rnams shes pa ni/ /blo zhan rnams kyis mi nus so/ /yang dag sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul 'di/ /
gang dag nas kyang ma 'ongs te/ /gang du'ang 'gro bar mi 'gyur ro/ /'di dag rang byung sku yin no/ /tshad med shin tu 'dren pa rnams/ /chos 'di rab tu bshad
mdzad kyang / /chos la gnas pa gang yang med/ /zhing rnams bye ba kun na snang / /mkhyen pa mtha' dang dbus med de/ /chos kun thugs su chud cing rtogs/ /
chos kyi dbyings la rab zhugs nas/ /rnam par 'phrul pa ston pa mdzad/ /chos rnams kun la chags pa med/ /'gro la de ni bsgribs mi mnga'/ /tshad med pa yi
yon tan gyis/ /zhing rnams kun na rab tu snang / /gang zhig ye shes 'di dag dang / /ye shes thams cad rtogs 'dod pas/ /bsam pa rnam par sbyangs byas te/ /
byang chub spyod pa spyad par bya/ /drang srong chen po'i byin gyi rlabs/ /'di 'dra gang gis mthong gyur cing / /de ni the tshom mi byed na/ /dge bshes mchog la brten pa
yin/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' dam pa'i rgyal mtshan gyis sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas nas de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa
'di dag smras so/ /shin tu zab ste brjod du med/ /brjod du yod kyang 'da' bar dka'/ /tshig gi lam las shin tu 'das/ /nam mkha' la ni rgyal ba snang / /de bzhin
gshegs pa'i byin rlabs kyis/ /mi yi seng+ge mthong bar 'gyur/ /yang dag sangs rgyas rtogs med kyang / /rgyal ba rnam par rtog par snang / /'jig rten mgon pos chos
nyid dngos/ /zab mo 'di dag yang dag bstan/ /gang zag mtshungs pa med pa yi/ /des ni sku 'dir rab tu 'byung / /thams cad gzigs kyi spyod yul gyi/ /ye shes chen
po 'di 'dra ste/ /'di la gang zhig rtogs 'dod pa/ /des na rgyal ba mngon du byos/ /yid kyi dbang po rnam dag pas/ /de bzhin gshegs pa bsnyen bkur zhing / /'di yi
tshul las 'da' byed tshe/ /nam yang skyo bar mi bya'o/ /mi zad pa yi bsod nams dang / /byang chub sems kyis brtan pa rnams/ /the tshom rnam par bzlog byas te/ /de
dag la ni skyo med ltos/ /rgyal sras gang gis chos dbyings kyi/ /shin tu bstan pa'i mthar phyin pa/ /des ni kun gzigs rnam 'phrul ba/ /'di dag shin tu 'da'
bar bya |dad pa chos 'di'i rtsa ba zhes/ /chos kyi phung pos bshad mdzad kyi/ /dad pa shin tu cher bskyed la/ /byang chub spyod pa spyad par gyis/ /sangs rgyas bsti stang gang
byed cing / /de bzhin gshegs la drin gzo ba/ /yang dag sangs rgyas dpal ldan las/ /de dag rgyang mar mi gnas so/ /bdag nyid che ba 'di
lta bu| |gang zhig thos mthong mkhas pa rnams/ /spyod yul thob par cir 'gyur ba'i/ /smon lam su zhig sbyong mi byed/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' dpa' ba'i
rgyal mtshan gyis sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas nas de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /ji ltar nyi ma'i 'od snang bas/ /
mig gis gzugs rnams mthong gyur pa/ /de bzhin sangs rgyas byin rlabs kyis/ /dag pa'i sems ldan rgyal ba mthong / /ji ltar brtson 'grus stobs ldan pa/ /
rgya mtsho la ni 'jug par byed/ /de bzhin ye shes stobs ldan pas/ /bsam du med pa'i sangs rgyas mthong / /ji ltar sa bon rnam pa dag /zhing bzang la ni skyer 'gyur
pa| |de bzhin sems bsam rnam dag la/ /sangs rgyas chos ni skye bar 'gyur/ /ji ltar nor gyi phung po yis/ /dbul ba thams cad spong byed pa/ /de bzhin sangs rgyas
chos rnams kyis/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnam dag 'gyur/ /ji ltar dug tu gyur pa la/ /nad med dug sman rgyal bar byed/ /de bzhin nyon mongs rnam pa la/ /rnam dag
tshul ni spyod yul lo/ /sangs rgyas kyis ni gang bsngags pa'i/ /dge ba'i bshes la brten byas na/ /de yi mthus ni sangs rgyas kyi/ /chos nyid 'di dag thos par 'gyur/ /bskal
pa bye ba grangs med par/ /sbyin pa mchog rnams sbyin byas kyang / /'di yi tshul la rab spyod pa'i/ /grangs dang char yang mi 'gro 'o/ /sangs rgyas yon tan mtha' yas te/ /
mtshan gyis shin tu rnam par bris/ /brjod pas yang dag sangs rgyas rnams/ /rgyal ba shes par mi nus so/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rkang gnyis mchog /gnas nas
g.yo ba mi mnga' bar/ /sku ni kun tu rnam rgyu zhing / /chos kyi dbyings ni ston pa mdzad/ /ji ltar nam mkha'i khams 'di ni/ /nam yang rang bzhin mi 'gyur te/ /de bzhin
sangs rgyas chos nyid kyang / /ngo bo nyid las 'gyur ba med/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' skar ma'i rgyal mtshan gyis sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam
par bltas te de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /mi yi 'jig rten 'di kun dang / /lha yi gnas rnams thams cad dang / /'gro ba ma lus kun na yang / /mi yi
gtso bo shin tu snang / /ji ltar sems dngos gcig pu las/ /rnam pa tha dad sems brjod pa/ /de bzhin sangs rgyas sku gcig las/ /sangs rgyas thams cad brjod pa
yin| |byang chub gnyis su med par brjod/ /byang chub de yang mtshan nyid med/ /mtshan gyis mngon par rnam bris pa'i/ /sku rnams gnyis su
snang bar gyur/ /mkha' dang chos kyi dbyings la zhugs/ /sgyu ma'i sa yang rab tu bstan/ /de phyir sangs rgyas de dag gi /spyod yul lta ba zad pa med/ /yang dag
sangs rgyas chos kyi sku/ /mgon po thams cad dus gsum du/ /ji ltar 'dul ba'i 'gro ba la/ /gzugs kyi skur yang rab tu snang / /'di 'dra'i lus su bdag gyur ces//
sangs rgyas rtog par mi mdzad de/ /ston la rnam rtog mi mnga' yang / /byin gyi rlabs ni ston par mdzad/ /dbyer med pa yi dbyings la yang / /chos kyi dbyings ni yang
dag gnas/ /'jig rten khams ni tshad med par/ /thub pas rnam par rtog pa bstan/ /sku ni sprul pa ma yin te/ /sprul min pa yang sku ma yin/ /sprul pa med pa'i
chos 'di yis/ /sprul pa rnams ni rab tu bstan/ /yang dag sangs rgyas tshad med pa/ /chos kyi dbyings la shin tu brten/ /mtha' dang dbus med rab tu zab/ /tshig
gi lam gyis bzla bar dka'/ /kun tu 'gro ba'i chos rnams la/ /de bzhin gshegs pa don des mkhyen/ /zhing rnams kun la chags mi mnga'/ /chos kyi dbyings
la rnam par spyod/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' ye shes rgyal mtshan gyis sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di
dag smras so/ /kun mkhyen ye shes ma chags pa/ /de la zhugs pa gang gyur pa/ /de yi sems ni tshad mi zin/ /byang chub kyi ni spyad pa spyod/ /de bzhin gshegs pa mang po
rnams| |yul dang yul du de snang ba/ /chos rnams phyogs gcig gang la yang / /yang dag sangs rgyas gnas pa med/ /'jig rten sgron ma de dag gis/ /byin gyi rlabs
ni gang bstan pa/ /bskal pa bsam gyis mi khyab par/ /'di yi mtha' ni rnyed par dka'/ /dus gsum rnams ni ji snyed pa'i/ /sems can rnams kyi mthar thug pa/ /bgrang
ba'i mthar ni phyin par nus/ /'dren pa la ni mthar thug med/ /de dag sku ni gcig tu snang / /sku gnyis de dag bsam mi khyab/ /'jig rten khams su snang gyur kyang / /
sku la gnyis su gyur pa med/ /ji ltar zla ba shar gyur pa/ /tshad med pa yi gzugs brnyan rnams/ /chu yi snod du snang gyur kyang / /zla ba gnyis su gyur pa med/ /de
bzhin chags med mkhyen ldan rnams/ /chags med rnam par 'tshang rgya ba/ /zhing rnams kun na rab tu snang / /sangs rgyas la ni gnyis kyang med/ /'di la gcig
kyang yod ma yin/ /sku ni gnyis sam gsum du med/ /ji ltar sems can bsam pa bzhin/ /tshad med par ni rab tu snang / /sku ni 'das pa ma
yin te| |ma 'ongs pa yang sku ma yin/ /skyes dang byang chub mya ngan 'das/ /skad cig gis ni rab tu snang / /ji ltar sgyu mar gyur pa'i gzugs/ /skyes pa ma yin 'ongs
pa min/ /de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku/ /skye ba med par shin tu bstan/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' rin po che'i rgyal mtshan gyis sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi
rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /yang dag sangs rgyas tshad med par/ /tshad du sku yang rnam par bstan/ /
ji ltar 'dul ba'i sems can rnams/ /de bzhin 'dren pa rab tu mthong / /sku la phyogs ni med par brjod/ /sangs rgyas yul ni ma lus khyab/ /bar snang nam
mkha' ji lta ba/ /de bzhin sangs rgyas bsam mi khyab/ /der ni sems kyang 'pho ba med/ /sems la skye ba'ang yod ma yin/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyod yul ni//
skye ba med la rab tu gnas/ /ji ltar rab rib ldan pa'i mig/ nang na med cing phyi na'ang med/ /de bzhin 'jig rten sangs rgyas dag/ nang na mi bzhugs phyi na'ang
min| |'jig rten kun gyi don gyi phyir/ /rkang gnyis kyi ni mchog byung ste/ /'jig rten du ni ma byung yang / /'jig rten dag tu skye bos mthong / /sangs rgyas rnams la zhing mi
gnas| |rgyal ba dag la nyin mtshan med/ /skad cig ma yin zla ba min/ /rgyal ba la ni lo mi gnas/ /'jig rten dag na ji skad brjod/ /nyi ma che ge mo zhig tu/ /rang
byung byang chub rgyal bas thob/ /sangs rgyas nyi ma'i rjes mi 'brang / /de la bskal pa yod ma yin/ /dus kyang ma lus med pa ste/ /dus gsum yang dag rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /
mgon po rnams ni mnga' bar 'gyur/ /ji ltar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ni/ /nam yang mtshan dang mi gnas te/ /nyin mtshan zhes kyang rab tu brjod/ /de bzhin sangs rgyas
chos nyid do/ /bskal pa gcig dang dus gsum du/ /'dren pa bzhugs pa ma yin te/ /dus gsum zhes kyang rab tu brjod/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos nyid ltos/ /de nas
byang chub sems dpa' rdul dang bral ba'i rgyal mtshan gyis sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so//
yang dag sangs rgyas sku gcig ste/ /'dren pa thams cad don gcig kyang / /tshad med gzhan dang gzhan dag tu/ /phyogs bcu kun na rab tu snang / /gang gis ma lus thams
cad kyi| |chos kyi dbyings rnams kun khyab pa/ /sems can gtso bo thub pa yi/ /spyod yul rnams ni ci 'dra ltos/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos nyid
ni| |nang gi skus kyang snang ba min/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs/ /phyi rol skus kyang mi snang ngo / /dus mang kun tu las rnams kyis/ /ji ltar las rnams
bsags pa bzhin/ /de bzhin so sor phye ba'i skus/ /rigs su byung bar rab tu bstan/ /rgyal ba'i chos nyid ma gtogs par/ /sangs rgyas sku ni 'di 'dra ba/ /grangs
su bgrang bar mi nus te/ /bsam pas lta yang shes mi nus/ /ji ltar bdag cag sems kyis las/ /bsam gyis mi khyab mi 'byung ba/ /de bzhin sangs rgyas bsam
mi khyab| |sems kyi 'phrin las mi mnga' 'o/ /ji ltar zhing rnams bsam yas pa/ /sa la rnam par dag pas mdzes/ /de bzhin sangs rgyas bsam mi khyab/ /
'gro ba dag na mdzes par snang / /ji ltar las rnams 'jug pa ni/ /rkyen gyis rab tu 'byung 'gyur ba/ /de bzhin rgyu rnams mthun pa las/ /sangs rgyas shin tu mthong
bar 'gyur/ /yid bzhin nor bu'i rgyal po ni/ /ji ltar yid bsam rdzogs byed pa/ /de bzhin sangs rgyas chos nyid kyang / /rtag tu smon lam rdzogs par sgrub/ /
mtha' dang dbus med 'jig rten 'dir/ /'jig rten mgon po 'dren par 'gyur/ /de yi smon lam de dag gis/ /phyogs bcu 'di dag rgyal bas gang / /de nas byang chub
sems dpa' dri ma med pa'i rgyal mtshan gyis sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad ba 'di dag smras so/ /ye shes
dkyil 'khor sangs rgyas te/ /'jig rten chos rnams rnam par sbyong / /'jig rten chos rnams rnam sbyangs nas/ /sangs rgyas chos rnams rab tu brjod/ /de ste sems can mnyam
sangs rgyas/ /sems can la las bsam byas na/ /rgyal ba de dag thams cad mthong / /sangs rgyas la ni gshegs pa med/ /sangs rgyas la ni dmigs byas nas/ /sems
kyis sangs rgyas dmigs pas na/ /sems bskyed pa dang rgyal mnyam par/ /de bzhin de dag rgyal ba mthong / /dkar ba'i chos kyis nyer brtan cing / /gang gis grags
pa rnams sbyangs pa/ /de dag thams cad sems bskyed la/ /shes rab ldan pa rab tu bzhugs/ /dmigs pa dag dang byin gyi rlabs/ /mi yi gtso bo ston pa mdzad/ /de
phyir dmigs pa kun tu yang / /sangs rgyas rgyal ba gshegs par brjod/ /'jig rten khams rnams 'di dag ni/ /sangs rgyas sku rnams bdag gi med/ /sems la
bdag gi med pa bstan/ /byang chub rtogs la bdag gi med/ /mi yi seng+ge'i chos nyid dang / /dpa' ba'i stobs la rab tu gnas/ /lus dang
mtshan nyid mi 'dra ste/ /snang ba'i sems dang mnyam pa'i sku/ /ji ltar 'jig rten de bzhin sku/ /ji bzhin skur yang rgyal ba ste/ /sku yi rang bzhin shes pa ni/ /
sangs rgyas chags pa med ces bya/ /sangs rgyas kun tu gzigs pa ste/ /chos rnams thams cad rab tu gzigs/ /sangs rgyas chos dang byang chub rnams/ /gang
la'ang dmigs pa med pa yin/ /sangs rgyas la ni gshegs pa med/ /sangs rgyas gang na'ang mi bzhugs te/ /yang dag sangs rgyas log pa med/ /de bzhin
gshegs la len mi mnga'/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' dpal gyi rgyal mtshan gyis sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i
tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /sangs rgyas thams cad kun tu khyab/ /zhing gcig la ni mi gnas te/ /thams cad du ni sangs rgyas gshegs/ /zhing
rnams kun tu rab tu snang / /sangs rgyas sku ni thams cad du/ /byin gyi rlabs dag rab tu 'byung / /'tshang rgya chos kyi 'khor lo dang / /bsam pa bzhin du mya ngan
'da'| |sangs rgyas la ni su zhig sems/ /ci phyir sangs rgyas bsam mi khyab/ /yang dag sangs rgyas su yis mthong / /rgyal ba sus kyang mthong bar 'gyur/ /ji ltar chos
rnams chos nyid dang / /ji ltar sangs rgyas spyod yul du/ /gang dag chos rnams gcig tsam yang / /de bzhin nyid la mi 'jug go /'di ni 'jig rten 'di rgyal zhes/ /'jig
rten dag na rnam rtog yod/ /gang gis ngo bo nyid shes na/ /'jig rten med de rgyal ba'ang med/ /'jig rten dad par bya ba'i phyir/ /mgon po dag ni mngon sum ston/ /
de dag gi ni lta ba 'di/ /shin tu dmigs par mi rung ngo / /gang gis chags pa rnam bzlog cing / /chags pa med la dga' byed pa/ /chags pa thams cad rnam bzlog
nas| |chags med chos nyid rtogs par 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas zhes brjod gang yin dang / /gang gi rnam 'phrul snang gyur pa'i/ /chos ni dus gsum thams cad du/ /rnam pa
kun tu mi rnyed de/ /gang gis chos nyid 'di shes shing / /gang gis 'di bzhin yid ches na/ /thams cad mkhyen cing kun gzigs pa'i/ /de bzhin gshegs par myur du
'gyur| |sangs rgyas thams cad rnam 'phrul ba/ /'di dag thams cad tshig gis bstan/ /yang dag sangs rgyas tshig lam med/ /tshig gi lam gyis rab tu brjod/ /de nas
byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi rgyal mtshan gyis sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa
'di dag smras so/ /gang gis rnam par 'phrul snang ba'i/ /sangs rgyas mthong ba med pa bas/ /'jig rten khams rnams thams cad kyi/ /sdug bsngal phung po blangs
kyang bla| |'gro ba gang gis byang chub tu/ /sems can ni nam yang ma bskyed pa/ /de dag gnas 'di thos gyur na/ /sangs rgyas byang chub 'grub par 'gyur/ /gang gis
bsam ba gcig gis kyang / /'di la mos byed mkhas pa ni/ /mi yi mchog tu mi 'gyur zhes/ /des ni the tshom mi bya'o/ /de yi rnam par 'phrul ba ni/ /bskal
pa bye ba'i bar du dkon/ /su zhig 'di la mos byed pa/ /de dag bla na med par 'gyur/ /brjod du med pa'i sangs rgyas rnams/ /skad cig skad cig bsnyen bkur
kyang / /'di yi tshul la mi gnas na/ /de dag bsnyen bkur byas ma yin/ /gang la sangs rgyas brjod gyur pa'i/ /chos 'di gang gis thos gyur pa/ /des ni mi bde kun
gyis kyang / /spyad pa rnams ni blang bar bya/ /ji tsam chos kyi dbyings rnams dang / /dus gsum gyi ni mgon po yi/ /sangs rgyas rnams ni rten pa yi/ /ye shes
chen po gcig thos nas/ /phyi ma'i bskal pa bye ba rnams/ /zhing rnams re rer zad byas shing / /'di yi tshul ni brtson byed na/ /de la byang chub dkon pa med/ /sems can
rnams kyi sngon gyi mtha'i/ /'khor bar mi rnams gnas gyur kyang / /des ni sangs rgyas rab phyung pa/ /chos nyid 'di ni shes ma gyur/ /chos rnams zhig par byas pa med/ /
chos ni 'jig par mi 'gyur te/ /kun tu snang las rnam 'phrul ba/ /'jig rten de dag thams cad bstan/ /shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas phal po che zhes
bya ba las/ /dga' ldan gyi gnas su byang chub sems dpa' 'dus pa'i tshigs su bcad pa bstan pa'i le'u ste/ nyi shu dgu pa'o// //de nas byang chub
sems dpa' rdo rje'i rgyal mtshan de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi mthus ting nge 'dzin ye shes snang ba zhes bya ba la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i rgyal
mtshan byang chub sems dpa' ting nge 'dzin ye shes snang ba zhes bya ba de la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu de'i tshe na phyogs bcu'i phyogs re rer 'jig rten gyi khams
sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa'i pha rol nas de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgya phra stong gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis zhal
bstan pa mthong ste/ de dag kyang 'di lta ste/ mtshan rdo rje'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba sha stag go /phyogs gcig nas ji lta ba ltar phyogs bcu nas kyang
de bzhin te/ de la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis 'di skad ces kyang bka' stsal to/ /rdo rje'i rgyal mtshan/ de ltar khyod byang chub sems dpa' ting nge
'dzin ye shes snang ba la snyoms par zhugs pa legs so/ /legs so/ /'di ltar yang rigs kyi bu/ khyod la phyogs bcu nas de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas
kyi zhing brgya stong phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed thams cad kyang mtshan mthun pa sha stag gis 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad 'di'i sngon gyi
smon lam dang / sngon gyi byin gyi rlabs dang / khyod kyi ye shes rnam par dag pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa bas brtan pa'i phyir 'di lta
ste| byang chub sems dpa'i mi 'jigs pa rnam par dag par bya ba dang / spobs pa chags pa med par bya ba dang / ye shes kyis bsgribs pa med pa'i sar 'jug par
bya ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems yangs pa la rab tu 'jug par bya ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba mi zad pa phun sum tshogs par bya ba dang / bsgribs pa med pa'i
chos dkar po yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang / chos kyi dbyings la sgo kun nas 'jug par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi cho 'phrul bstan par bya ba dang / sngon gyi
mtha'i mur thug pa'i ye shes dang dran par rgyun mi chod par rnam par dag par bya ba dang / dbang po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis byin du brlab par bya ba dang
chos kyi sgo mtha' yas par bstan par bya ba dang / shes pa kun tu gzung bar bya ba dang / 'di lta ste/ yongs su bsngo ba bcu yongs su rdzogs par bstan pa dang / byang
chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba gzung bar bya ba dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i tshogs rnams rab tu bstan par bya ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i
ye shes mi chod par bya ba dang / smon lam chen po'i skabs dbye bar bya ba dang / don shin tu bstan pa la 'jug par bya ba dang / chos kyi dbyings yongs su shes par bya
ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi yid rab tu dga' bar bya ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi srid pa gsum gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba mthun pa la brten par bya
ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs yang dag par gzung bar bya ba'i phyir byin gyis brlabs pa mdzad kyi/ kye rigs kyi bu/ khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs
pa'i mthu dang / sangs rgyas kyis byin gyis brlabs pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bsod nams kyis brtan pa dang / gzungs kyi snang ba la
zhugs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos bsgribs pa med pa la zhugs pa dang / chos kyi dbyings snang ba'i chos nyid du bya ba dang / kha na ma tho ba med pa'i chos dkar po yang
dag par bsgrub par bya ba dang / ye shes kyi spyod yul yangs pa la gnas pa dang / bsgribs pa med pa'i chos snang ba la gnas pas chos bstan pa 'di brjod pa dang /
bstan pa'i phyir spobs par gyis shig /de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i rgyal mtshan gyi ye shes tshad med pa nye bar
sgrub pa mdzad do/ /spobs pa chags pa med pa dang / tshig rab tu dbye ba la mkhas pa nye bar sgrub pa mdzad do/ /bsgribs pa med pa'i chos kyi snang ba nye bar sgrub pa
mdzad do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sku dang gcig pa nye bar sgrub pa mdzad do/ /tshad med pa'i dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pa nye bar sgrub pa mdzad do/ /
byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnam par dbye ba la mkhas pa nye bar sgrub pa mdzad do/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad nyams pa med par yongs
su bsngo ba'i ye shes nye bar sgrub pa mdzad do/ /chos thams cad kyi lhag mthong mngon par bskyed pa la mkhas pa nye bar sgrub pa mdzad do/ /chos thams cad bstan pa'i gnas
rgyun mi chod pa nye bar sgrub pa mdzad do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar ting nge 'dzin 'di nyid kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i gzi brjid kyi phyir ro/ /de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
de dag gi phyag g.yas pas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i rgyal mtshan gyi spyi bo la byug pa mdzad do/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i
rgyal mtshan la reg ma thag tu ting nge 'dzin de las rnam par langs te/ langs nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' de dag la smras pa/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /byang chub
sems dpa'i smon lam 'di lta ste/ 'gro ba thams cad khyab par byed pa/ sems can thams cad yongs su skyob pa 'di ni/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa ste/ kye rgyal ba'i
sras dag /de la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams 'das pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi yongs su bsngo ba la slob bo/ /ma
byon pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi yongs su bsngo ba la slob par 'gyur ro/ /da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi yongs su bsngo ba
la slob bo/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi yongs su bsngo ba gang la bsam ste de skad du smras pa de
dag ni| gang / kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /yongs su bsngo ba'i grangs ni/ du zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /bsngo ba bcu po 'di dag ni/ 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang /
da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis gsungs so/ /gsung ngo / /gsung bar 'gyur ro/ /bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems can rnams kyi 'du shes
'gog cing 'gro ba thams cad yongs su skyob pa zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yongs su bsngo ba dang po dang / mi phyed pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba byang chub
sems dpa' rnams kyi yongs su bsngo ba gnyis pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad la yang dag par bskyed pa zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yongs su bsngo
ba gsum pa dang / thams cad rjes su song ba zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yongs su bsngo ba bzhi pa dang / bsod nams kyi mdzod mi zad pa zhes bya
ba byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yongs su bsngo ba lnga pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad dang mnyam pa nyid kyi rjes su song ba zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa'
rnams kyi yongs su bsngo ba drug pa dang / 'gro ba thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi rjes su song ba zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yongs su bsngo ba bdun pa dang / de
bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan nyid kyi rang bzhin zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yongs su bsngo ba brgyad pa dang / chags pa med cing bcings pa dang / dkrol ba
med pa zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yongs su bsngo ba dgu pa dang / chos kyi dbyings tshad med pa'i rjes su song ba zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' rnams
kyi yongs su bsngo ba bcu pa ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yongs su bsngo ba bcu po de dag ni/ 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung
ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so/ /gsung ngo / /gsung bar 'gyur ro/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yongs su bsngo ba
dang po sems can rnams kyi 'du shes 'gog cing 'gro ba thams cad yongs su skyob pa zhes bya ba gang zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /'di la byang chub sems dpa'i sbyin
pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la rab tu sbyor ba 'am/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par sbyong ba'am/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sems pa'am/ brtson 'grus
kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson pa'am/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnam par dpyod pa'am/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la 'jug
pa'am/ byams pa sgom pa yang dag par bskyed pa'am/ snying rjes snying brtse bar byed pa'am/ dga' ba la rab tu dga' bar byed pa'am/ btang snyoms la shin tu
gnas par byed kyang rung ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams la shin tu bsam nas dge ba'i rtsa ba de dang / de dag la rab tu sbyor zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba tshad med pa rnam par phye nas
'di ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis sems can rnams kyi sems can dmyal ba'i ngan song rgyun chad par 'gyur ba dang / byol song gi skye gnas pa dang / gshin rje'i
'jig rten pa rnams kyi sdug bsngal gyi phung po rnam par ldog par 'gyur ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'gro ba thams cad la rnam par dag pa'i mthar phyin par phan 'dogs pa
gang yin zhes sems bskyed do/ /de de ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yang dag par bskyed pa na 'di ltar yongs su bsngo ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sdug bsngal gyi
phung po thams cad rnam par bzlog pa'i phyir bdag sems can thams cad kyi gnas su gyur cig /nyon mongs pa thams cad las yongs su dgrol ba'i phyir bdag
